title: BlackBerry Work
description:
*** Contact your IT administrator for any help with setting up BlackBerry Work *** 

Take care of business simply, elegantly and securely with BlackBerry Work. Stay on top of your business email, schedule and join meetings, and manage your contacts with an easy to use, all-in-one app. 

BlackBerry Work delivers a personalized business experience. See your colleagues’ photos in your email. View online availability to chat everywhere you work - in email, a calendar event and on their contact card – a capability unique to BlackBerry. Quickly navigate among your business apps using Launcher.  Switch easily between composing an email, adding a contact, or scheduling a calendar event with quick action buttons. And always know that your personal privacy is protected without intrusive geo-location capabilities. 

Simple app navigation:
• Launcher: Simplify multi-tasking and app navigation with easy switching between your email, calendar, contacts, app settings and other BlackBerry apps.
• Quick actions: Work smarter with quick action buttons to compose an email, schedule a meeting or add a contact.

Improve productivity:
• Email: Manage your inbox on the go! Check and respond to email, securely view multiple-format attachments (.pdf, .doc, .ppt, .xls, etc.), move messages to a folder, and take and attach photos. 
• Calendar: Stay in touch with your colleagues, customers and partners wherever you are. Join meetings or schedule new ones. Even send a quick reply message if you are running late.
• Contacts: See all of your Outlook contacts, personal and work. Add additional information to the contact card or get the caller ID by sync’ing the contacts to the device. 

Personalize your experience:
• Directory Photos: Your inbox, calendar and contacts now displays photos from your global address list so you can now enjoy more effective social interactions 
• People centric collaboration: Choose the best way to reach your colleagues based on their online availability status. Initiate a call, an email, an IM or an SMS from within the app them based on their availability. 

Quick notifications:
• VIP notifications: Never miss an important message. Set VIP status for key contacts to be notified via custom alerts when they send you an email.

recentChanges:
• See free busy for multiple participants across multiple times and days
• Ability to focus on key user's availability while scheduling meetings
• Import iCS file into your Calendar
• Export a Meeting as ICS and send it via email.
comments: One of the worst enterprise software solutions I have come across in my life. Almost every week or sometimes 2 - 3 times a week it gives a message saying "ADAL Token" expired - you then need to uninstall the app & re-install it - needless to say everytime with new passwords. Utterly frustrating & time wasting app.

Barely functional work app. Requires authentication every 15 minutes or less, and unless you're in that period of authorization, you won't get notifications of meetings or emails. It shows inexplicably wrong information regarding how many unread emails I have and half the time stalls indefinitely upon launch and has to be restarted. If any companies are listening, do not use this software!

They application theme doesnt work at all. I'm using Samsung S7. I want to use light mode but every now and then it turned automatically to black mode, while in black mode I cannot compose new messages because I'm using custom font color (dark blue) and when in black mode the fonts impossible to read. Pls help to fix the bug.

Authentication frequently spins forever, and the only solution seems to be closing the app and waiting an unspecified amount of time for the issue to resolve, making the app effectively unusable. This has been happening for about 3 weeks (that I've noticed) so far. Force stopping the app and clearing the cache doesn't seem to make a difference, nor does rebooting the device, though that would be an unacceptable workaround anyways.

Horrible experience trying to use this app on my galaxy s10. I cannot ever log in, the app just clocks forever, so eventually have to reinstall leading to multiple attempts to configure/log in for the first time, and hours or days later when it finally works, I am only able to log in one time before I have the same problem with logging in again and restart the cycle.

title: Steady - Find Work. Earn Money
description:
Install Steady for FREE today and join our community of over a million users.

Steady is here to help you look after your financial health - from matching you with opportunities to make Extra Money, to providing you an income tracker to monitor your earnings, to ensuring you have the benefits you need while you work.

We want to inspire and connect our members to extra income opportunities. Discover and share ways to increase your earnings and motivate others to do the same. We want you to focus more on your future making money. So how do we do that?

*We are constantly adding new extra income opportunities.
And every new job posting is a new opportunity for you to make more money.

*We know that finding extra income is time-consuming.
The Steady app helps you search and filter extra income opportunities that meet your financial needs, your availability and your skill set.

*We help you tackle your financial goals.
Steady’s Income Tracker lets you focus on what you are earning and understand where your money is coming from rather than just keeping an eye on what you’re spending.

*We want to inspire you to not only increase your earnings but feel motivated by the progress.
There are a variety of reasons people look for extra income. For some, it is a long-term plan to free themselves from unwanted debt. For others, it is more short-term, looking for extra income to pay for a vacation or fund a child’s school trip.

Download Steady for FREE today. Create your account, find work and make extra money alongside the Steady workers who are changing the way Americans work and live. The goal of the Steady community is to help you find new jobs, make extra money, get stronger financially and feel motivated by the progress.

To learn more about Steady- our team, our vision, and our accomplishments visit https://www.steadyapp.com. Have more questions or need a helping hand? Please email us at help@steadyapp.com.

summary: Get matched with on demand jobs and start tracking your income today!
recentChanges:
We are excited to introduce the Financial Stability Plan! Create your personalized plan in under two minutes and start your journey to increase your income and improve your financial health. Financial stability may seem like it’s out of reach, but it doesn’t have to be. Steady is here to help.

Just as much as we want to help you, we’d love for you to help us. Please send suggestions and feedback to help@steadyapp.com.
comments: The app itself has worked pretty sufficiently. But Steady is an awesome concept. I have already received $50 in gift cards from "Income Boosters" and it has encouraged me to start doing food deliveries. I'd say the only downfall, though very small, is that they can change the amount you're rewarded at anytime, even if you're in the middle of completing a booster task. But other than that, I've had no problems with the app and they reward exactly as promised. Pretty large amounts might I add. :)

The boosters are awesome! They pay them the 1st and 15th of each month, so you may not receive them immediately, but they add up. Not the most effective for finding a full time position, (WHICH I'm still on the hunt for) but it's a lovely app to make some cash on the side. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to get some extra cash, as it is a lot more effective than filling out surveys online

I have had the best experience using this app! I received a $40 Visa card in my email from Steady as soon as I completed my 1st Instacart shop. I actually had completely forgotten about the Income Booster & it was such a great surprise!!! Thank you so much Steady!!! I recommend this app to everyone, it's awesome!!!

Ok listing of leads and side gigs, but nothing new or that you don't get from a quick Google search. Don't waste your time with the 'Income Boosters', they always find a way around paying. A test with 4 different users tried 2 boosters each and none were paid, for various obscure reasons. Users stuck with consequences/memberships/accounts.

As an app to help identify new opportunities this is well done. However I fail to see why my banking sign in credentials are required to complete setup. Routing and account number to set up direct deposit, hey no problem. But I'll be damned if I'm handing over access to my money to anyone.

title: Work Log
description:
Work Log is a quick, easy and free way to keep track of your shifts and calculate the number of hours worked and wages paid over your pay period. 


★ Fast, simple and straightforward way to track your hours, expenses, tips, mileage and more

★ Save time with features like automatic break deduction and pay period settings

★ Use widgets to punch in and out quickly, or as a shortcut to add a new shift. (tap on the punch in time to cancel it)

★ Punch In and out, or enter your hours manually

★ Customize how Work Log looks with options like date and time formatting, when your week starts and a light or dark theme

★ View your hours in a variety of ways such as by week, month, pay period or all of your shifts at once

★ Set your pay period to automatically calculate how many hours you worked and your wages for each paycheck

★ Track as many details as you want with a variety of tracking options like Expenses, Tips, Sales, Mileage, Holiday Pay and more

★ Have deductions and/or bonuses automatically calculated for paycheck estimates

★ Keep track of overtime hours and wages for up to two separate overtimes



Install with Work Log Pro for extra features like tracking multiple jobs, removing ads, exporting all data as a spreadsheet (.CSV) or as a PDF, as well as backup and import all saved data as a database via email. Both Work Log Free and Work Log Pro must be installed to benefit from these features

60 mountview ave
Toronto, Ont.

m6p2l4
recentChanges: - Several bug fixes
comments: I have the free version of the app and I use it for a student job. I need to record my hours to submit a monthly report. With the widget of this app, this has become very easy to do! It's a clean design, very funtional and intuitive. I transfer the data by hand however, as I did not buy the pro version. What I appreciate a lot is that you can tell the app how precisely the hours should get reportet, e.g. I choose +/- 15min.

Works so far. I noticed that back on 1/14/20 someone made a feature request to be able to select which job she is clocking into and you responded that it was on top of your list, however that app hasn't received an update since November. I don't mind purchasing an app, but not if the dev is slow with updates.

***update*** I was able to get the program to figure out the holiday pay with help from the company but it still doesn't calculate the overtime correctly. For me that's not a big issue cause I can do the calculation manually. That is why I only rated it a 4. Other than that it's a great program to help me keep track of my hours and pay. Thank you. It doesn't figure the hours correctly Tried to enter my holiday pay and it makes no sense as to how it calculates

I stuck with it for a month, I even bought pro. The User Interface just seemed to lack, for a paid app. My biggest grip is when I Punch In or Punch Out, I can't see what Job i'm currently in, I ways had to go back and fix my hours. It's not until you punch out that it lets you select what Job you want to work for. Grip #2: When I go to view my shifts, the table is too wide for my Samsung Galaxy S10. So I would swipe to see the rest of the data, I would constantly swipe to the next week and lose my spot. I had finally moved on to another time card app.

To the person complaining about having to manually enter their unpaid breaks, you can set up an auto break command, and it will automatically subtract whatever time you enter. You can find this in your settings, at the bottom of your settings menu. Thank you developer for this app. I've been using it for a long time now. Probably since you first published it.

title: When I Work Employee Scheduling
description:
When I Work is the leading employee scheduling, shift planning and time clock app; providing the easiest way to create an employee schedule, manage your employee time clock, and message your staff— all from the app or desktop. Get started today for free! 

Over 100,000 workplaces in 50+ countries trust When I Work for their shift scheduling, time & attendance tracking, team task management, team messaging, and time clock. 


WHY MANAGERS LOVE IT

✔ Make and manage the work schedule with the employee scheduler

✔ View entire staff schedule from anywhere at anytime

✔ Setup a time clock for staff to clock in and out 

✔ Create, update, and publish schedules and open shifts fast 

✔ Alert staff of changes to the schedule via push, email or SMS

✔ Monitor & approve shift trades and time off requests 

✔ Message with staff 1:1 or in groups without sharing personal info


WHY YOUR TEAM WILL LOVE IT 

✔ They can see who’s working (with permissions) 

✔ View & confirm work schedules from anywhere at anytime

✔ Clock in and out of shifts

✔ Keep their availability up to date

✔ They can pick up extra hours

✔ Trade shifts with coworkers

✔ Request time off 

✔ Chat with coworkers 1:1 or in groups


TRY WHEN I WORK TODAY 

✔ No setup fee. Free and paid versions

✔ Free, monthly or annual billing options

Always know that you have the right people, at the right place, at the right time with the schedule maker. Finalize your time clock generated time sheets and export to payroll in minutes. 

Spend More Time Growing Your Business: Save an average of 8 hours per week on employee scheduling and attendance. Spend more time working to grow your business and less time fighting scheduling fires. 

Increase Employee Accountability: Send employees instant schedule updates so they never have to ask when they work. Reduce employee no-shows and improve accountability across your team by 25%.

Handle Changes with Ease: Never worry about keeping track of random time-off and shift change requests. Stop rebuilding shift schedules by reviewing and approving employee requests in real-time.

✔ Joining an existing workplace? It's free - just find your workplace and log in.

recentChanges:

comments: Bugs galore crashes on most phones, If you open the app and have it in the background it pops up over the app you are currently using so for example if you have a map app on it pops up over- not helpful. Doesn't notify for messages from bosses.
When it works, it works well. Most times o cant access messages, shows a "something gone wrong" screen, most messages dont go to my alerts, despite having permissions.
Terrible! Constantly crashing. Also, too much clicking to enter time sheets. Why can't we just "add" a scheduled time slot to our time sheet with one or two clicks?

We use this where I work, and it is more trouble than it's worth. It has to have decent internet to function at all, which is a problem when you're travelling. The in app pop ups cover up buttons, so you have to wait for the unneeded popups to go away to clock-in/out for instance. Make the app function offline, and when you're clocked in the app has a floating tile (like Messenger) that you can put away if you like.
I used to like the app but now with the new update, it won't let me create a shift and pick a particular employee. It only allows me to create an open shift for that particular schedule. What a pain!

title: Workday
description:
The Workday app provides secure, mobile access to your Workday applications on-the-go.

Our simple interface lets you

• Quickly conduct administrative tasks – view or request time off, capture expenses, clock in and clock out to enter time worked, or review your payslip – without disrupting your day.
• View your notifications and tasks that require your attention and immediately take action.
Easily browse the company directory, securely view worker profiles, and leave feedback while it’s still top of mind.
• View your team or individual profiles and immediately take actions relevant to your role, such as perform a job change, make a compensation change, or provide performance feedback.
• Stay connected to your business by gaining quick insight into what’s important through interactive reports and dashboards.

And if your mobile device is ever lost or stolen, you can be confident that your data is secure. With support for fingerprint scanning, only you can access your information.

Note: Your organization must authorize access to the Workday mobile app. Not all mobile features may be available to you. You’ll have access to mobile features your organization has enabled, based on your role. Not all Workday features are available on mobile.

comments: I don't know what issues everyone else is having, but mine has no issues. In fact, I came to review this simply because I love the new breakdown of pay details. It's very handy and informative! My only complaint is that I have to enter a one time password that they send through text every time I log in. Checking the "remember this device" doesn't make a difference. But it's 5 seconds of of my day, once a week. I'll survive.

This app NEVER remembers my email. It's so annoying that I have to enter it every single time I log in. Even if I check the box "remember me", it never does. Plus, EVERY SINGLE TIME I log in I check the box "don't verify my identity on this device again" and still send me a code by text all the time. I mean, seriously? Not practical at all. You guys need to fix it I'm sick of having to wait for a code and entering that code on the app everytime I log in!

So, I signed into my account on Workday and I'm not allowed to; swipe around to view the full web page, open any other outside pages, can't pinch the screen to make it fit my 6.7 inch display, not able to rotate the screen, as well as there is NO settings to change the displays. ONLY thing I'm able to do is scroll up and down. Quite horrible, very horrible.

"Work Day Does Not Work" The "remember me" function does not work. The "Do not challenge me" does not work Every time you want to log in you need to log in with email/pass, than wait, than go to a secondary screen for phone confirmation, request a text, wait for the text, put that in, and than log in. Every time. This is my experience both with home office and at work. System is very fiddly and has a lot of issues. Avoid if possible. New updates are useful, but dont adress any of tproblems.

Simply awful...I guess I'm not surprised. Workday on my pc is terrible and they've somehow managed to make the app worse. It's telling me it doesn't recognize my user name or password but doesn't provide any means or instructions to recover it. Everybody I speak to in my hr department tells me how much they hate the system when I call for assistance. If you're thinking of getting workday for your company do yourself a favor and don't.

title: Veryable - Work & Get Paid Daily.
description: Veryable is a marketplace of on-demand labor for manufacturing and distribution operations, which provides businesses with higher productivity and fewer administrative burdens and workers with flexible work arrangements – the ability to choose where to work, how much, and when.
descriptionHTML: Veryable is a marketplace of on-demand labor for manufacturing and distribution operations, which provides businesses with higher productivity and fewer administrative burdens and workers with flexible work arrangements – the ability to choose where to work, how much, and when.
summary: Find work. Get Paid Daily. Changing the labor equation for manufacturing.
developerAddress:
2019 N Lamar St, Suite 250
Dallas, TX 75202
recentChanges: Added Op Address on the Boarding Pass for better directions.
comments: This was a wonderful app till they introduced bidding the amount you get paid instead of how many hours. Now companies are abusing this new feature by accepting contractors and canceling the job when they get a lower bids from other contractors in order to pay the lowest and now the typical job is going to be around $7.50 an hr. I for one have had 2 jobs get canceled this week after being accepted and they were reposted to be filled immediately with everyone bidding almost $30 less.

Need extra work on the side, well here ya go! Just stay active on the app taking jobs and it works great. But if you take a break from using the app it's nearly impossible to get accepted for jobs. I was to busy with my regular job that I didn't have time for extra work here so I took a break for a few months and now NO companys on here will accept my bid.

Love the concept. Gigs and temp work pay my full time bills... Great idea and all... But ive been using the app for a year and a half and never gotten paid. And now you can actually bid, like lower...? Sux to see it things go backwards instead of making forward progress
Great app to make some part time cash or fulltime oppurtunities as well.

I think the app is great for people who are able to do physical labor type jobs assembly work. I haven't secured a position yet through this app but I have referred this app too many people who I think could do the type of work that shows up in this app.

title: Work Mobile
description:
Work Mobile is for customers using Verizon Connect Work. If you’re a customer of Verizon Connect’s Workforce, download WorkPlan.

Verizon Connect Work’s new fieldworker app, Work Mobile, lets technicians in the field receive job details and share notes, photos and signatures with Admins in the office -- all with improved speed and performance. 

What’s new in Work Mobile

-          Faster performance when accessing job information.
-          New mobile experience, designed by customers like you.
-          Improved Map & Jobs List with job assignments.
-          Multi-photo upload with thumbnail and gallery view.
-          Automatically work offline when jobs are out of range.
 
Get access to these features, too.

-          See job details, contact information and special instructions.
-          Get instant updates through push notifications.
 -         Quickly complete a checklist at the start and end of a job.
-          Record findings and work performed on site.
-          Capture photos of the site to provide proof of service.
-          Collect customer signatures when the work is complete.
-          Record parts used and time spent on the job site.
-          Track when the job starts, when it’s in progress and when it’s finished.
-          Send invoices and track payments right from the field.

 
Not a Verizon Connect Work customer?
Sign up for a demo, or contact us at 866-844-2235 to help you get started.

recentChanges: Updated branding.
comments: It would be really nice if the app would tell you the site names, rather than the billing name. We pick up and deliver to same billing company, but no where on the app will it give a site name. Has an address, but sometimes all they need is a name. Fix it!

Originally used to fleetmatics work app. Changed over to the work mobile app and have been much happier with the functionality. I only have one problem. We take care of clients that have multiple sites. When a dispatch is sent out to the mobile user for a client at a particular site it only shows the client name it does not show the site name. Developers must have overlooked. For example to take care of a school district. And each school has its own name. Please fix.....
Lots of aggrivating clitchy problems. I have to Uninstall and reinstall the app all the time to make it start working again. I really wish they would make this app work better.

It looks better than the Classic but is shocking to use. Issue with Start & Finish questions not showing. Verizon's answer - use the Classic until it's fixed. Now been an issue for over 2 weeks, unsolved and no-one has reverted back to me despite requesting our account manager contact me. It was rolled out as the next best thing and that all should migrate to it. Clearly no-one bothered decent beta testing properly.  Seriously, don't bother downloading this app if you want your field ops to be able to do their jobs properly.

Update: I have now been experiencing several new glitches. The app crashes daily on me and makes me lose a large majority of my information that I have to reenter by memory. When I contacted Verizon connect all Verizon support staff could tell me is that my phone is the issue and not the app itself. All of my coworkers seem to have different problems. If I didn't have to use this app for my work I wouldn't touch it with a 10-ft pool. Verizon needs to fix their app. Crashes DAILY

title: JobGet: Find Jobs Instantly. Work & Career Search.
description:
Get a Job in Three Quick Steps!

1. CREATE A PROFILE FOR FREE IN SECONDS
No more resumes! Creating a profile takes less than 60 seconds, and you’re ready to start applying.

2. SEE JOBS NEAR YOU AND APPLY WITH 1-CLICK
See jobs near you and apply with 1-click! Hear back within 24 hours!

3. CHAT INSTANTLY WITH EMPLOYERS
Chat with employers directly in the app through instant message. Ask questions, learn more about the job, and can even have a video interview in-app!

************************

Find Top Candidates in Three Quick Steps

1. CREATE A POSTING FOR FREE IN SECONDS
Create a simple profile in less than 60 seconds, and get your word out to top candidates asap!

2. EASILY FILTER THROUGH TOP APPLICANT PROFILES
No more going through long and indistinguishable resumes! Find distinct candidate profiles and filter by experience easily.

3. CHAT INSTANTLY WITH CANDIDATES
Chat with candidates directly in the app through instant message. Set up in person interviews or even in-app video interviews instantly!


************************

comments: Excellent and convenient app for hiring. We tried out at our store last week for a hiring fair. Not only were the candidates extremely responsive , they were high in caliber and had great experience as well. I would highly recommend this platform to any hiring manager thats looking to recruit top candidates.

I've used a lot of job apps in the past, but this was by far the easiest one to use. I love the simplistic interface & the instant messaging. Employers are also quite responsive to you and there are a lot of jobs hirings. Well done!

I am very impressed with the customer service! I was messaging and they were reaching back however my phone does not get signal and I wasnt recieving the messages.We connected on the phone and they are very professional and understanding. I also have been contacted by employers interested in me which has never happened with other apps I tried.if I could give this app a 10 I would definately do it. I look forward to the great things to expect as this app grows and new jobs are added in my area
An amazing app. Its fast, easy to use and really simple to contact and connect with different managers.
super smooth + easy to use. fell in love with the interface as soon as i opened it. this job app gets it.

title: WorkMarket - Find Jobs and Get Work Done Anywhere
description:
The WorkMarket Android app lets our talent community manage their assignments on the go. No matter where work takes you, we make accessing, completing, and getting paid faster and more efficient for all assignments, right from your Smartphone.

• Your Work. Get instant access to all of your assignments and invitations on the go
• Find Work. Search and apply for new work by scrolling through all of Work Market’s available work listings 
• Manage Work. Check-in, upload deliverables, complete assignments anywhere
• Work Status. See up-to-date in progress, pending, and invoiced assignments status
• Request to reschedule assigned work, reimbursement, bonus or unexpected expenses
• Your Money. View paid assignments and withdraw funds in your Work Market account
• Need help? Contact support right in the app

We are actively working on new features and improvements to bring you a better experience. Click on Send App Feedback in Settings to send us your feedback or email us at support@workmarket.com.

comments: I like the app, I like most of the updates. I moved to a new phone, a Moto Z4, and now the app is unreliable. If it's open, I can't reopen it with the icon, I have to use the button that shows all open pages and select from there. It gives me messages that it can't update when checking in, for instance, when mobile service is working for other apps. It also shows me that the work order or message linked from an email does not exist. Once I was able to reload, and the work order was available.

Horrible app, and honestly I feel like the acquisition of the OnForce freelance platform was sold to WorkMarket only for the user data and never intended to be a fully functional platform to keep us freelancers working. No jobs, and bogus interface looks fake and job postings never update and seem fabricated. I hope I'm wrong but if not, legal action should be taken accordingly.
used to be fast. now it rarely spins up or refreshes before timing out, even when i have 5 bars. need to spend less time adding new features and more time streamlining the code they already have.

This company shows inaccurate information on your profile and it won't let you correct it and they won't corrected themselves. I've been in contact with Support who basically says they dont have time to fix their problems that they created.

after the update back in October or November became very slow and half of the time u have to force close and reopen again just to check in, check out, upload pics,..... refresh doesn't work!!!! and yes i uninstall and installed several times

title: Mobile@Work
description:
MobileIron's Mobile@Work securely connects your Android and WearOS device to your company network so that you can easily access email and other work resources.

Best Technology
☆ Purpose-built for Mobile IT with millions of users globally
☆ Complete separation of corporate and personal data
☆ 500+ of Global 2000 customers
☆ More than 97% customer support satisfaction rate

With just a few quick steps, Mobile@Work makes getting access to corporate resources easy on your Android device:

► PRIVACY: Visual Privacy capabilities provide transparency to employees by allowing them to view exactly which data their company can see and which actions their company can take on the device.
► FAST ACCESS: Immediate access to corporate email, calendar and contacts. 
► AUTOMATED: Connect automatically to corporate Wi-Fi and VPN networks.
► EASY: Discover and install work related applications on your device wherever you are. 
► SECURE: Automated compliance with corporate security policies.
► FIND MY PHONE: Locate lost or stolen devices and remotely manage them.
► ARCHIVAL: This is a Mobile Device Management app and has the ability to perform enterprise archival and backup services including system audits for enterprise customers.

Note: Mobile@Work works in conjunction with MobileIron Core deployed by your company’s IT organization. Please follow the instructions from your IT organization to use this app. Mobile@Work is required to access corporate resources and therefore should not be removed without first consulting your IT organization.  Visual Privacy allows your organization to see device details such as model name, OS version, roaming status, and company apps.  However, IT cannot see personal information such as personal email, personal contacts, photos, videos and voicemail. 

Learn about Mobile Device Management: http://www.mobileiron.com/en/solutions/mobile-device-management
Learn about Mobile Security: http://www.mobileiron.com/en/solutions/mobile-security
Learn about BYOD: http://www.mobileiron.com/en/solutions/byod
Learn about Visual Privacy: https://www.mobileiron.com/en/video/visual-privacy

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mobileiron
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mobileiron
Follow us on G+: https://plus.google.com/+mobileiron

Find more about MobileIron: http://www.mobileiron.com

recentChanges: - Localization update with support for more languages
comments: To all of those having issues on Android 10.... There's been some kind of change for how the MDM works with Android Enterprise. If you're using a fully work managed device, you need to factory reset the phone, and set it back up again using the QR code set up, which your company should be able to provide for you. This fixed my Pixel 4 XL. HOWEVER, I don't think it will give you an opportunity to restore from a Google backup... at least it didn't for me, but my company doesn't use G Suite.

Not compatible w/Pixel Droid 10. They claim to be compatible and stay up to date but I have been waiting for to be able to install the new operating system update to my Pixel since it came out. So much for supporting the one operating system that has Droid native to it. My phone has been without the latest security ever since the new operating system update came out. They are unresponsive and do not take this serious. All they care about is iPhone. 3/10/2020 Still no progress or eta for PIXEL!!

Worst product ever. The connection is always in error. There is zero support! Companies make people use it and it doesn't work. I have to uninstall and re install every couple of months and my email is out for days in the process. Drains your battery and is a complete waste.

The secure environment works well on a Samsung S9+ with Android 10 installed. I've had no problems with MobileIron/Mobile@Work since day 1 (at least as far as app use and sync is concerned). A few hiccups, but none noteworthy and all cleared up relatively fast. Company techs configured secure calendar, contacts, google web browser, mail, file sync, play store, and tasks. All work well for me. On my S9+, if I don't want to be bothered by work notifications, I turn off the work profile -- good to go. My biggest issue just arose. I don't know if it's Android 10, Samsung, Mobile@Work, or internal tech; but, when in Mobile@Work (e.g., Mail), I can't select gboard as the default keyboard. Samsung keyboard is the only option. Gboard is available outside the secure environment. I get that Google collects your info/might not be all that secure in the long run. You think your default keyboard doesn't/is? I need the option to select gboard in the Mobile@Work environment so I can use google assistant for hands-free typing. TBH, I simply don't like Samsung keyboard. Please re-enable gboard in Mobile@Work.

Totally useless if your using Android 10. Keeps popping up every second with Secure Apps manager has stopped working. Can't use the phone and only way out is to factory reset. Can't even uninstall it. When is a fix coming out? Very poor service considering when Android 10 was released.

title: Hours Tracker: Keep work log, work day timesheet
description:
Work Hours Tracker helps you track your work time and easily keep a work log. Simple, straightforward and organized.

The perfect work hours tracker and time clock for self-employed, freelancers, contractors, hourly workers and employees. Calculate your earnings, invoice or next pay stub.

Tracked work hours can be exported as an Excel time-sheet, submitted to payroll or used to draft your invoices.

Key Benefits:
• Save time and maintain accuracy with automatic hour tracker. Done via location/GPS. Turn ON/OFF as you see fit, or adjust when it'll activate.
• Stay organized by keeping track of work hours and seeing reports by pay period, week or month
• Earn your full due, by easily keeping track of daily and overtime hours and pay
• Reduce the clutter and hassle in your life with simple one-click time calculator
• View how long you've been working at a glance with notification widget

How it works:
You can use the app in three ways:
• Use automatic hours tracker and the app will keep track of how long you've been at each work location.
• Punch in when you start workday and punch out when your work is finished. You can also track any breaks you take during this period.
• Simply add a new time entry. Define the start and end and you're good to go.


Your work log hours are saved to your account and backed up to the cloud. This data is simply for your timesheet reference and not used by us for any other purpose.


Ideal work hour tracker for people that work with multiple clients or jobs, e.g: trades professionals, contractors, accountants, lawyers, self-employed, construction...

• Flexible work hours tracker; time calculator for single or multiple jobs

When generating a time-sheet you can decide to export data for a specific project/job and a mixture of time periods: current workday, week, or pay period. Giving you the flexibility to export the work hours you want.

The generated file will include all information. It will also include times in decimal format.

• Save time and reuse information

Information like clients, projects and hourly rates are saved and re-used automatically. Keeping your work log up to date has never been so easy.

• Automatic work hours tracker via location
The GPS hours tracker is designed to be efficient with your battery usage and easily adjustable:
- define when GPS time tracker is running: which days of the week, from to what time of day
- manually turn automatic hours tracker ON or OFF with a touch of a button (automatic time clock)
- an icon in the notification bar will show up when the hour tracker is running so you know what's going on
For privacy purposes, your general location log is only kept on your own device. Only time blocks that you save are backed-up to the server.

• View earnings:
- by month, week, workday, custom pay period (e.g: bi-weekly)
- as time-sheet for individual project
Daily and weekly overtime work hours and rates are tracked and applied automatically. Set up when overtime kicks in via the settings.

• Sharable time-sheet

You can share your work log as an attachment. Email it, text or use a messaging app. You can also simply keep it as a spreadsheet file, used with Excel, Sheets or OpenOffice.

If you have Google Drive, Dropbox or similar apps installed on your phone, you can save your time-sheet straight to these services.

• Safe backup with cloud sync

Your work log information is all automatically synced to the cloud, so you can work and get paid worry free!
Using your hour tracker for work but suddenly have to restart your phone? or run out of power? No problem! The timer will keep on running and you won't lose your work log no matter what!

• Who is work hours tracker for?

Our hour tracker is for contractors, business owners, self-employed, hourly employees and freelancers, anyone who would need to track work hours using a work time clock app.

Hours Tracker is made by Time Squared co. Send us your feedback!

summary: Simple time clock. Track work hours to verify pay check and make time-sheet.
developerAddress: 2008 Rosser Ave, Unit 2106, Burnaby, BC, V5C 0H8, Canada
recentChanges: • Resolved minor issues
comments: Great app, keeps track of your pay amt. as well as your hours, say if u go in at 7am & get off at 4pm daily u can do all your hours for the week at the beginning if you want. If u end up getting off earlier you can definately change it later. They have a free version or a paid one, the paid one will keep popping up asking you to pay, hit the back button to continue using the free version. I love it its definatly helpful, they have the option to manually enter or hit button to log in &out.

This app has saved me so much money it's not even a joke. I work as a plumbing contractor for my pops company and before I found this app we were always getting into arguments come payday about my hours. Thanks to this app not only does it keep track of my hours but also keeps track of what job I'm on and how long I'm at each job. It's also a nice little extra seeing how much money I'm making each day so I know what to expect come payday. Great app and would recommend to anyone in the same boat.

I love the app. I like the suggestion about double taps or something to prevent accidental punches. I hate the auto tracking. Would love to see an improved importing into Excel so that I can make totals easier. For example, I don't know an easy way to total the hours worked without manually going in and changing the value to a number. And maybe add web access.

I love it! There is only one problem and that is it adds on a random day from a previous week or month so have to be careful not to add it into your time for that pay period. Although its not calculated, it's weird that its randomly on a current pay week or period.

I absolutely love this app. It's super simple to use and extremely helpful for someone that works independently. I'm a nanny and it's really nice to just put my hours on here and have it calculate it all for me then let me send a report to the family I work for instead of sitting down and having to figure it all out and hoping there's no errors. I would highly recommend!! 10/10

title: Shifts by Snagajob - Flexible Shift Work
description:
Pick up shifts with Snagajob. Say hello to flexible shift work with no set schedules. If you're looking for side jobs where you can do flexible work, then apply to pick up shifts with Snagajob.

Once you're hired, you can pick up shifts at local restaurants, retail stores, event companies and hotels—all right from the app. Get access to flexible work right at your fingertips.

Here's how it works: 

1. Snag a shift - You're instantly alerted when businesses post new shifts that fit your availability. You choose when and where you want to work.
2. Do work - Before a shift you'll review the requirements and show up prepared for a job well done. If you don't like a shift, you don't have to go back.
3. Get paid - After a shift, the manager confirms your hours and your money is direct deposited weekly. You'll always earn more than minimum wage plus bonuses.
You can currently pick up shifts in VA, DC, NC and TX with many more locations coming soon. If you're looking for full-time work visit www.snagajob.com or check out the Snagajob - Job Search app.

Take control of your work schedule when you become a Snagajob shift worker. Say hello to a new side gig! Download the app and apply to join our crew.

needa update faster with shifts and notifications and i try to claim.shifts and igibes error message and someelse is allowed to grab it

title: Instawork Gigs & Jobs
description:
From Michelin-star restaurants to local cafes, catering and hospitality businesses, you can easily browse and apply to hourly gigs or permanent work with the Instawork app. 

*We’re currently operating in Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, Phoenix, San Diego and San Francisco Bay Area. We're coming soon to more cities!*

The Instawork app helps you:

- Increase your take-home pay with permanent jobs and hourly gigs that fit your schedule
- Connect with exciting new food and beverage businesses and build connections with other restaurant pros
- Have a flexible schedule and easily choose where you work and when 
- Learn and expand your skill set with each new gig
- Get peace of mind knowing there are always gigs available when you need to pick up an extra shift
- Increase your chances to get hired permanently by working with new hospitality businesses in the area

The Instawork app makes it easy to:

- Quickly create your profile to apply for jobs or gigs - no more paper resumes 
- Add co-workers and managers as references
- Book gigs that work for your schedule
- Work hourly gigs and earn up to $30/hr 
- View your earnings as you complete each job and get paid weekly 
- Search and browse for permanent jobs near you - No more Craigslist searches!
- Directly book interviews for permanent jobs
- Easily schedule and manage your interviews 
- Communicate with businesses right from the app

Jobs and Gigs opportunities listed through Instawork:

- Assistant / Floor Manager
- Bar Back
- Barista
- Bartender
- Busser
- Cashier
- Chef
- Counter Staff / Cashier
- Deli / Grocery
- Dish Prep
- Dishwasher
- Even Captain
- Event Server
- Event Setup and Takedown
- Food Runner
- General Manager
- Host / Reservationist
- Kitchen Cleanup
- Line Cook
- Pastry / Baker
- Prep Cook
- Runner
- Server
- Sous Chef / Kitchen Manager
- Sushi Chef

What pros say about Instawork:

"Before I knew about Instawork, I would walk into restaurants and ask if they were hiring and I always was ignored and when they did hire me they wouldn't give me the opportunity to show my skills. I was always put as a dishwasher. With Instawork gigs I walk into a restaurant feeling confident and know that I will be treated with respect".
Jose, prep cook and dishwasher, San Francisco

descriptionHTML:
From Michelin-star restaurants to local cafes, catering and hospitality businesses, you can easily browse and apply to hourly gigs or permanent work with the Instawork app.

*We’re currently operating in Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, Phoenix, San Diego and San Francisco Bay Area. We're coming soon to more cities!*

The Instawork app helps you:

- Increase your take-home pay with permanent jobs and hourly gigs that fit your schedule
- Connect with exciting new food and beverage businesses and build connections with other restaurant pros
- Have a flexible schedule and easily choose where you work and when
- Learn and expand your skill set with each new gig
- Get peace of mind knowing there are always gigs available when you need to pick up an extra shift
- Increase your chances to get hired permanently by working with new hospitality businesses in the area

The Instawork app makes it easy to:

- Quickly create your profile to apply for jobs or gigs - no more paper resumes
- Add co-workers and managers as references
- Book gigs that work for your schedule
- Work hourly gigs and earn up to $30/hr
- View your earnings as you complete each job and get paid weekly
- Search and browse for permanent jobs near you - No more Craigslist searches!
- Directly book interviews for permanent jobs
- Easily schedule and manage your interviews
- Communicate with businesses right from the app

Jobs and Gigs opportunities listed through Instawork:

- Assistant / Floor Manager
- Bar Back

summary: Instawork is the best place to find hospitality gigs and jobs for free.
recentChanges:
Thanks for using Instawork to find hourly gigs at local restaurants and hospitality businesses. We’re currently operating in a few cities and coming soon to more!
We've made things a little easier and killed a few bugs. Because bugs are never good in the food business. E-mail us at help@instawork.com if you have questions or feature requests.
comments: The people at Instawork are great at what they do, and offer positive feedback and technical support to the team members. It's almost like being your boss for your own company, and without all the hassels of a private hiring group, too! These guys are always ready to lend a helping hand for any person who loves new experiences, and what's better- getting paid! I would recommend this app over any and all of the competitors that are out there, similar to Instawork.

Have not been able to book any Gigs since WM kept asking for help but all I received was a computer generated e- mail. This was my 1st gig since WM and it was a better experience. I hope fir it to be alit easier to book more gigs

I worked for them. I haven't been paid. They couldn't provide direct deposit verification slip. When asked to provide given excuse of 3rd party payment. They owe me $228.00 . Should have received January 29th 2020. To this date nothing. When I call they disconnect me I am going to labor board. No one in Las Vegas NV. Really Instawork doesn't belong in Vegas. No support for workers

So far my experience has been I nightmare. Good up until they want some of your clients to write a review. The way it's set up turned out to have linked all my clients together into a group , and now I can thank this app for f#%@ing what client base I did have. I no longer have for pissing everybody off because I can not unlinked them . no customer service. No phone number. my clients are all linked and getting more pissed off by the minute. Now they want me to loose their #. I cant unlink!

Tedious... I've retaken the quiz portion several times to no avail. It won't let me progress without "taking the quiz" when I already have. I've sent in an email to ask for help with no answer aside a "your time is valuable" auto message. It seems like a pretty cool app from the first few steps but I couldn't tell you anything about the jobs or anything else past the profile set up

title: Microsoft Word: Write, Edit & Share Docs on the Go
description:
Read and edit documents attached to emails, collaborate with your team and bring the Microsoft Office features wherever you go with Microsoft Word. The Word app from Microsoft lets you create, read, edit, and share your files quickly and easily.

Word introduces a mobile PDF reader for your phone. Edit documents and read PDFs or e-books while traveling, before bedtime, or wherever you want.

Create documents, blogs, write-ups, or resumes on the go. Write letters, resumes, documents, or notes your way with robust tools that enable you to write with the best format options.

The writing app and word processor is as handy as you want it to be, whether you’re a blogger, writer, journalist, columnist, student, or a project manager working on documentation. Your office moves with you when you use Microsoft Word.

Write a letter, create templates, read Word documents, edit docs and collaborate with your team wherever you are with Microsoft Word.

Microsoft Word Features:

Create Documents With Confidence
• Create docs, assignments, letters, blogs, scripts, notes, resumes and more with beautifully designed modern templates.
• Editing with rich formatting and layout.
• Document editor keeps formats and layouts pristine and looking great.
• Docs app with templates for resumes, forms and more.

Read, Write, and Edit
• Read docs, letters, PDFs, scripts, and more on your device with Reading View.
• Edit documents from PDFs by converting to and from Word documents.
• PDF file conversion: save as PDF after editing and share your PDF file with a few taps.

Collaborate and Share With Anyone, Anywhere
• Project managers can collaborate by commenting in your doc right next to the text.
• Read & edit documents as a team and stay on top of changes to the text, layout, and formatting.
• Editor version history lets you revert to view earlier drafts.

Sharing is simplified
• Share files and collaborate with a few taps.
• File & doc permission management that lets you see who is working on them.
• Copy Microsoft Word files directly into the body of an email message with its format intact or attach your PDFs and docs to an email.

Microsoft Office 365
• Microsoft Office 365 users can access premium features:
• Editing tracks and reviews changes.
• Format with page orientation, columns, custom headers and footers.
• Edit charts and modify chart elements.

Download Microsoft Word now and edit documents anywhere.


REQUIREMENTS

OS version: running any of the supported versions of Android and have an ARM-based or Intel x86 processor. Support for Kitkat & Lollipop devices will continue till June 2019
� 1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size smaller than 10.1 inches.
Unlock the full Microsoft Office experience with a qualifying Office 365 subscription (see http://aka.ms/Office365subscriptions) for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.

Office 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.
This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Office on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula

summary: Powerful mobile writing app. Use Office to easily create, share & edit documents
comments: Office is awesome. The subscription model is a bit of a deal breaker. I can't stand reoccurring payment plans and my plan is apparently going to end. So if office Uninstalls itself I'm switching to Linux. You buy a computer that works for a year then stops being functional is ridiculous. It feels condescending. You're company has billions in profit and I can't just buy the software and move on. I love your software and I hate your payment plans. But what do you care? You don't.

I hate to complain, because it might just be the best Word Processing app out there. But, there are innumerable problems with the interface - especially manipulating/dragging the cursor for editing. Also there are periodic discrepancies in template formatting, indentions, margins and paragraph spacing. All in all though, it gets the job done. And, as I said, it probably is the best mobile word processor out there. I'm sure that with time and updating the devs will get all of that fixed.

Wonderful!!! It's more than wonderful this software has been a dream of mine for over twenty years I was first using Microsoft 98 word and word weaver. I think that was the name of the product that I had used. in my office supply and tool store. It was a really a good product back then. It really promoted my thoughts and ideas into a reality. Thank You. Office 365 is where it's at " a good product "

This app seems to do most of what a desktop version of Word does. The trick is to figuring out what all of the little icons mean to do what you need to do. For example, you can convert a table to text, but it took me a while to figure out that there was a conversion *arrow* that looks similar to a "back" arrow (or *undo* arrow) that was actually the convert icon. I don't know if that example made sense, but the point is that you can do a lot with this if you're willing to figure it out.

Not full-fledged like the Windows version, but good for the Android platform, well tailored to touch-screen interaction and a works well with mouse and keyboard on a tablet. You'll miss some features and sometimes find that annoying, but overall, it's probably the best word processing app you can get for your phone or tablet.

title: Bluecrew - Find Flexible Work
description:
Install Bluecrew for FREE today and join the 300,000-strong and growing Bluecrew community.

Bluecrew connects you to flexible and steady jobs that fit your schedule, while you get paid weekly. Our employees have W-2 status and benefits. We help you build your resume while offering you training opportunities to help further your career.
 
How do I join the Bluecrew Team?
1. Download and Signup on the Bluecrew app
2. Accept an in-person interview near you
3. If you are hired, you can start working as soon as the day after your interview!
 
Why work with Bluecrew?
 
*Weekly pay
Bluecrew pays you weekly so you don’t have to wait two weeks for payday. 
 
*On-demand jobs
Bluecrew instantly connects you to employers and top pay in your area. After you pass your interview, you can choose the jobs and shifts you want from the app.
 
*You have W-2 status
When you work with Bluecrew, you are an employee of the company, and that means you get overtime, double-time, health benefits including insurance, and worker’s comp.

We have jobs available in the following areas, but there are more on the way so stay tuned.
 
Bay Area CA, Dallas TX, Denver CO, Inland Empire CA, Los Angeles CA, Minneapolis MN, Orange County CA, Reno NV, Seattle WA, St. Louis MO, Washington D.C.

What are you waiting for? Create your account, schedule an interview, and start earning money!
 
To learn more about Bluecrew our team, our mission, and what we’re up to visit https://www.bluecrewjobs.com. Have more questions? Please email us at support@bluecrewjobs.com.

recentChanges:
Preview of available jobs are now shown during sign up
Added support for remote interviews
Bug fixes and under-the-hood enhancements
comments: If you're looking for work, full time, part time, time and a half over 40, check this app out! These guys are real! A lot of flexibility if you want to squeeze in a few hours along side another job. And they're adding new job types all the time. This is not just another labor ready/manpower type job. Looking for skilled workers. They have a bunch of different jobs in the food service/hotel industry. They happen to have a real big demand right now for cooks/chefs. Check it out!

Every time I have tried to use this app there's always an issue, I recently just had to log back into my account which is connected to my number and email address. When they asked me for my number to send a verification code, it says the number is already with the app, which is correct because it's my number. I believe I was locked out of the original Gmail account connected to the blue crew account. But they still send a confirmation email which doesn't make any sense.
Easy to use and if you have any questions or concerns just contact support and usually you have a response in a no time.
The app is self explanatory. So easy to use. The interview process was smooth and quick. Seems like an opportunity to good to be true lol
A true blessing to be working for them so convenient and reliable I'm so happy I found them 💯.

title: Wonolo
description:
Wonolo helps workers connect with immediate flexible and in-demand daily jobs that pay in 1-3 business days. We empower people to make their own schedule, be their own boss, and find fulfilling work.

We’re the modern solution for how the world is working. The traditional temp staffing model was built for the ‘50s way of thinking. Wonolo was built for single parents, artists, students, people with a past, dreamers, and doers. We call you Wonoloers, the in-demand worker. 

Working a job you’ll love has never been easier – here’s how it works:
- Open the app and complete a brief onboarding process
- View open jobs and the qualifications needed to perform them
- Pick the jobs you want (no resumes or interviews needed) - you choose when, where, and how often you’ll work.
- Work your job and get paid in 1-3 days
- Rate the company and provide feedback to help us improve the worker experience

We take your feedback seriously. It helps us further our mission of making work flexible and fulfilling for all. Contact us anytime at support@wonolo.com or visit us at Wonolo.com.

summary: Work. Now. Locally.
recentChanges:
We update the Wonolo app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a few of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- We are providing policy education to workers to help them determine whether to accept a job.
- We squashed some bugs.
comments: Excellent app that gives you good paying temporary jobs on a daily basis that pays within 2-3 days, they can lead to great long term job/s from various companies. Not forgetting it pushes job notification as soon as they becomes available. I have been using it for over a month now and It's great.

Love this app. They truly help if you're in a bind and need extra money, or in between jobs, heck you can even work full time from the app if you want to. They pay out 3 days after job is completed. My only negative is that do not have a number to contact for support, but the support group that you email generally gets back to you within 48 hours. I would recommend this app to anyone who is looking for work. And with the badge tier they also grant benefits to those who have worked long term!!

The only time I get alerts is when my location is off that upsets me the most and then when you click on it it's gone. I turn my location on and I get no alerts for hours at a time and when I finally get one it's not available anymore. I put the times I was available and I get alerts for times I can't work or for places way too far to drive (like other states)

So far it's pretty crappy. Can't update location. Can't enter bank information. Can't enter ssn to be able to enter bank information. Can't complete onboarding process because - according to the app - there's nothing available in my location - which is BS becausr their own map says otherwise. Plus a friend who lives in the same area uses the app and referred me because of the available work in the area. Can't find information to contact support. BS app so far.

Horrible app support team service. A (lady) team member of the support team for this wonolo app texted me a "😘" randomly out of no where after talking about my hours and work. I sent screenshots of conversation to support team and the next day(today) someone else from the support team texted me thinking that that is ok. I feel very uncomfortable with using this app any further until further notice from sexual harassment situation. Thank you, I'm done.

title: At Work
description:
With "At Work" you can manage your working hours so simple and straightforward! 

The application is also available for Android Wear devices (watch).

At Work is a simple and appealing application that is designed to simplify your working life. 
Just one click to record your entry or exit from your work, thus helping you to keep track of the hours you engage in day-to-day. 

Exploit new technologies:

 ☆ NFC: you can create a tag with the text "punch" to insert the events via the NFC capabilities of your smartphone.
 ☆ Smart WiFi: this is a new function created by MiNi Group to exploit the connections to WiFi office to figure out when you enter or exit.
 ☆ QR Code: you can use a QR Code (downloadable from the settings) to record events.
 ☆ Geolocalization: you can decide whether to register the location of the events (useful for travel, meetings,...).
 ☆ Android Wear: through the app for Wear devices you can easily insert events (entry, exit, voice note) and view infographics and lists directly from your wrist.

You can easily figure out how many hours you worked during a day, a week or a month. Reports can be customized, letting you know exactly all the details of your working life. 

Some settings can be set via the standard working hours every day, so you can accurately calculate overtime, whatever your working hours. Other useful settings allow you to decide whether or not to calculate overtime and if round schedules. 

The application also allows you to enter notes, record special events or events of interest. 

A notification system (can be disabled) alerts you when you have finished your standard hours per day and reminds you when you are at work. 

Features: 
☆ Event Entry / Exit 
☆ List of events of the month 
☆ Calendar of Events of the month and week
☆ Detail of the day 
☆ Copy / Delete / Edit events 
☆ Export configurable data 
☆ Notification of start / end work 
☆ Backup / Restore Data 
☆ Configurability 


Creative Commons license:
Man by Matt Brooks, clock by Luis Prado and receipt by Benni from The Noun Project

comments: This is a great app for track hours. But need little updates and modifications. It's not Updated since 2016. I don't know where is the developer and why he/she don't look at the problems. I'm ready to pay extra just for some updates and improvements. The best app for track working times and specially who work two times per day. I tried almost everything on play store but nothing find like this one. Thanks anyway! Cordially.
Great app, allow to have control of your shifts, attempt to manage your overtime and to know every moment how much time have you been working
Very easy and nice app but it would be nice if there was a exstra overtime colum for sunday or public days works.

great app! but.. i have few remarks - please verify the formula of time calculating: from 8:30 to 17:15 is calculating 8h44min. also overtime is wrongly calculated. i mention i unchecked decimal time format. - add an event for timebreak (in minutes) - add posibility to remove ads (i would pay rather than have ads all the time)

great app but, i cant switch the way i like to export files. example i tried to use whatsapp to export files but that didnt work and now its stuck on Whatsapp. if this problem can be fixed it would be rated with 4 stars!

title: Workplace by Facebook
description:
We believe organizations work best when everyone has a voice and the power to make a difference. So we created Workplace, a collaboration tool that lets you and your coworkers:

- Create groups for your teams and projects, and use them to share unlimited project updates, files, videos, photos, ideas and more.

- Get work done anywhere, moving seamlessly between your computer and phone or tablet.

- Send messages and make voice and video calls using Workplace Chat.

You can use the app to sign into an existing Workplace account, or create one from scratch.

Workplace is ad-free and totally separate from Facebook. So you and your team can concentrate on aligning your goals, building successful working relationships and turning your company into a community.
descriptionHTML:
We believe organizations work best when everyone has a voice and the power to make a difference. So we created Workplace, a collaboration tool that lets you and your coworkers:

- Create groups for your teams and projects, and use them to share unlimited project updates, files, videos, photos, ideas and more.

- Get work done anywhere, moving seamlessly between your computer and phone or tablet.

- Send messages and make voice and video calls using Workplace Chat.

You can use the app to sign into an existing Workplace account, or create one from scratch.

Workplace is ad-free and totally separate from Facebook. So you and your team can concentrate on aligning your goals, building successful working relationships and turning your company into a community.
summary: Connect with coworkers, collaborate anywhere.
comments: It has all the annoyances and few features, endless, absolutely endless , hard-sell self-promotion notifications. If they just suppressed the mindless, USE WORPLACE, notifications, so one only received the occasional real one, it might rank above TERRIBLE. Yes, forced to use it by organisation, no free will I involved.

Mostly a great experience. It's both a powerful and useful tool for spreading information and increasing collaboration within companies. It does however, based on my own observations, have more bugs than it's big brother (the Facebook app).

Using this app for the first time and stuck in an infinite loop. Selected the login option and got the alert "Sorry, we were unable to find an account with the following email address". No problem, so I selected the sign up option and got the alert "(email address) is already registered on Workplace. Just tap 'Continue' to log in." Tapped continue, tried logging in again, failed again. I'm not logged into Workplace on any other device because same issue. What is happening... boo

So frustrating!! I haven't been able to to get on my account since it logged me out, have told my managers and company I work for and they can't even get me on yet everyone else can. Keeps telling me to use a one time passcode, but apparently that doesn't exist. Tried making a new account several times but it makes it as the whole company. I have to have this for my job but nothing is working, beyond frustrated...
Bug trying to login. Keeps in infinite loop while check your credentials fixed please!!

title: WorkDo - All-in-One Smart Work App
description:
WorkDo is an all-in-one team collaboration/business productivity app that makes teamwork a breeze with free features such as enterprise instant messaging, collaboration tools and HRMS tool that allow you to collaborate seamlessly across the entire team. There are features that allow you to assign a task, plan an event, start a poll or a workflow, add a note or upload a file or a photo to share to your work group. It’s an easy way to achieve team collaboration quickly and efficiently. 

-Workplace, a company-level environment which teammates can collaborate and discuss work-related ideas and issues within a safe and secure space. 
-Unbinded Workplace, for companies that don't have a company-wide email address, create a workplace with any email address and invite your team members to join.
-Different subsidiaries can have individual workplaces while teammates that work with other subsidiaries can easily switch to different workplaces and communicate efficiently.
-Create groups and add buddies to have small-group collaborations or one-on-one meetings with your teammates. .
-Dashboard function allows you to see all the tasks, events, and polls related to you and all the posts and moments from your groups and buddies. 
-Information such as read, task completion, and event attendance list help you to easily know the status of any item such as note, task, and event. 
-Use My Upcoming to see all upcoming items related to you in the next seven days.
Featuring:
Task: Assign, track, and comment on any task to keep projects on schedule and do more with less effort.
Event: Company-wide event can be planned easily with attendance list to accurately control the budget and activity. 
Note: Add a post to share interesting information or important announcements to the entire company or just within your group and between you and your buddies. 
Album: Capture work moments on photos and upload to share to the entire company or just within your groups and between you and your buddies. 
Poll: Take into account of everyone’s opinion on project directions and idea implementations. 
Files: Upload files to share resources and information.
Leave: Apply for leave is easy while managers can coordinate resources better and in advance. 
Human Resource (HR): Manage employee information and helps HR staff to reach employees easily during emergencies. 
Conf. Rm.: Book and manage conference room schedules
Expense: Apply and keep track of expenses easily.
Customer Relations (CRM): Manage your accounts and stay on track of your business. 
Attendance: Clock in/out to track work hours with post clock in/out and appeal available. Reports are also available.
Approvals: A general tool for everything that requires multiple personnel approvals.

Make teamwork effortless.

Work Do- Work easy, work smart

recentChanges:
To provide you with the best WorkDo experience, we strive to make our app better.

Bug fixes:
- Minor issues
comments: Excellent app for teamwork, it cuts down time on email communication, task delegation and convoluted multi-level approval process. Recommended!

With every update, this app just gets better and better. The latest features are awesome! My office uses WorkDo and with the ability to have a platform for every project and conversation, and now it is the only app we use to get information where it needs to go! Top-notch!

WorkDo is superb! This app is like a virtual workplace for your entire team to communicate and collaborate, if your company is considering anything else, it is pointless; this app is the only way to go!

What's a digitized workflow system when it relies on the company inteanet? This app has given us the freedom to discuss work topics and bounce ideas anytime we want. The leave and HR management are also icings on the cake! Kudos to the devs!
A very useful app! We use it for classes, workshops, seminars and to stay connected with colleagues. Gotta give this app a 5 star rating, considering all the things it can do!

title: Timesheet - Time Card - Work Hours - Work Log
description:
Employees, contractors and freelancers use Timesheet easily keep track working hours, automatically calculate salary, submit time sheet to managers or invoice to customers.

This version is in-app purchase:
1. Export report in csv, html and excel
2. Unlimited creating invoice

Time track
• Add time record easily
• Add time record by punch in, punch out and pause
• Update, delete and copy time record
• View time record in yearly, monthly, semimonthly, biweekly, weekly and daily
• View time record by calendar
• Filter time record by status, project and client
• Time record status: Open, follow up, invoiced and paid
• Auto overtime calculation

Project
• Support multiple jobs and clients
• Choose clients from phone contacts
• Default start time, end time and breaks
• Round time to 3, 5, 6, 10, 15, 30 or 60 minutes
• Daily/weekly overtime

Expense
• Register expense category, amount, date and note
• Register mileage, rate, date and note
• Show expense with time in report and invoice

Export
• Customize report fields
• Report in Microsoft Excel (XML), HTML and CSV
• Save report in SDCard or by Email

Invoice
• Create invoice in PDF 
• Customize invoice fields
• Invoice # in letter and number
• Customize tax name and rate
• Partial paid

Charts
• Bar chart with monthly amount
• Line chart with monthly amount

Settings
• Support your country currency (41)
• Password protection
• Auto default value
• Configurable first day of the week, biweek and month
• Support hour in decimal or hours:minutes format
• Support time in 24 hour or AM/PM format
• Support date in various formats

Database
• Auto backup database to SD card when exit the app
• Manual backup database to SD card and Google Drive™
• Restore database from SD card and Google Drive™
• Email database
• Clean all-time records

Have an idea or feature suggestion
https://worktime.uservoice.com

Available languages (more coming soon) 
We are looking translators to help us
• English, 中文, Deutsch (Johann), Español (Toni Rubio), Dansk (Lars Schilling), Nederlands (Albert Maat, Marco Split),  Italiano (Massimiliano), Brazilian Portuguese (Fernando Araujo, Humberto Bruckheimer), Français (Jerome Cavallo, Jean-Marie),  Bosanski (Dženana Šabeta), Norsk (Stian Pareliussen), Русский (Victor Andura), Svenska (Tommy Bruzell),  Magyar (Tommy Bruzell)

※ We are greatly appreciate your help with the translation of timesheet app.
※ This version has most functions without advertising, please upgrade/purchase export and invoice features to support our improving works.
※ If you like the app, then please give us a good rating as the driving force behind our continued development.
※ Since it is not easy conversation in the market review, if you have any suggestions or questions please mail to our mailbox directly. For market reviews, please just leave your rating and cheers, thanks again.

Permissions Information
• INTERNET and ACCESS NETWORK STATE: Google Backup
• BILLING: In-app Billing
• READ CONTACTS: Adding Client from Contacts
• WRITE EXTERNAL STORAGE: Backup and Export to SDCard

comments: I like the app so far. Still getting to know the app, but forced to rate each time opening the app before having a reasonable chance to have an opinion and after paying for premium version. *Rating Update* *Even though I've rated the app, it still randomly prompts me to give it a 5 star rating. It's a bit annoying after already paying $11. 99 for the app. *Don't think that you get every function after paying your original $11.99. You still have to pay other $11.99 for unlimited invoices.

Thank you for the fix! I had a problem with my phone and needed to reinstall the app without losing data. I contacted the developer and they were very quick to respond and created an update to enable me to update the install. It worked great! I really like the app and have been using it for several years. It is easy to create projects, add and adjust missed time, and track status.

This is a wonderful app. It's the best time card app I have found super easy to punch in and out, modifying the time card hours for example you forget to clock out it is super easy to change it. You can set your rate, multiple clients, overtime, invoices are super easy to make, and even miles if you have to drive somewhere. The full version of the app is a little expensive, 10$ but it is totally worth it if you have to keep track of your own hours.

Great app for keeping track of time and related data. I like the option of dding expenses directly to make invoicing easier. I would like the option of adding planned tasks for a period at 'punch in' rather than 'punch out'.
I am a case manager and have over 50 clients. This app helps me to clock in and out and saves names of all clients. Better than my old notebook I used until I found this app. Thanks

title: Gravy Work
description:
Gravy Work matches employers and homeowners with workers who are available to work either just a single day shift or multiple days across an event. Choose from our pool of qualified workers for your on-demand Cooking, Serving, and Cleaning jobs.

For Workers - Gravy Work offers a variety of single day and/or multi-day jobs to choose from and gives you complete control over your schedule. If you are a hospitality worker with experience in Cooking, Serving, or Cleaning; and looking to make extra cash and get paid quickly, download the app, tell us about yourself, and go through our onboarding process to have access to search and apply to hospitality jobs in your area.   

For Employers - Gravy Work will allow you to find and hire reliable and talented hospitality staff directly from your phone, in just a few steps. Whether you need a worker to cover a shift that same day, or you are organizing an event, use Gravy Work to post a job and choose from a pool of trusted candidates in your area that have passed our thorough screening process.  Plus, we take care of all of the details, including workers’ comp and taxes!
