title: Indeed Job Search
description:
Find jobs using Indeed, the most comprehensive search engine for jobs.
In a single search, Indeed offers free access to millions of jobs from thousands of company websites and job boards.
From search to apply, Indeed's Job Search app helps you through the entire process of finding a new job.

World’s #1 Job Search site*
- Join over 250 million job seekers each month who use Indeed
- Find jobs in over 60 countries and 28 languages
- Search the Indeed database of over 16 million jobs

Search
- Simple, fast-loading job search
- Find openings in cities near you using your device’s GPS
- View new jobs added since your last search and be the first to apply
- Search by job title, company and location to find your dream job
- Find full-time, part-time, contract, freelance and internship jobs

Apply
- Use your Indeed Resume to easily apply to select jobs
- Create, upload or import a resume, joining Indeed’s network of over 70 million resumes
- Personalize a message for each job before applying
- Don’t want to apply just yet? Send a reminder to apply later

Personalize
- Save or email your favorite jobs
- Create a free Indeed account
- Follow favorite companies to get the latest jobs and news
- Have the newest jobs delivered to your inbox
- See which jobs you’ve visited, saved, and applied to

Research
- Preview page displays full description of job posting
- See how companies rate, as evaluated by employees
- Read reviews of companies posted by over 12 million employees
- See photos of what it’s like to work at companies before you apply
- Review your own employer

Overall Indeed is a great job finder and gives great access to jobs hiring in your area, we also assist with your resume creation to help you find the right job for you.

By downloading this app, you agree to Indeed's Cookie Policy, Privacy Policy and Terms of Service found at www.indeed.com/legal, where you may avail of your rights at any time, including the right to object to the legitimate interest use of your personal data for marketing purposes. In order to provide you with certain services and support ad attribution, user data, such as your IP address or other unique identifier and event data related to the installation of the Indeed App, may be shared with certain service providers when you download or install this app.

This is performed for the legitimate interest of allowing Indeed to understand and optimize our users’ complete customer journey by:
- helping us understand how users arrive to Indeed
- better measure the performance of our ads;
- facilitating user logins through third party accounts in certain cases; and
- helping us understand where a user accesses Indeed through different devices.

Please send feedback to android@indeed.com

*comScore, Total Visits March 2017
Google Analytics, Unique Visitors, September 2018

Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://www.indeed.com/legal/ccpa-dns

summary: Find jobs anywhere, anytime with Indeed
recentChanges:
• Bug fixes

Like the app? Rate us and share your stories.
comments: Was great until a few days ago. Now it makes me re sign in everytime I open it. Sign in again to apply. My original searches were gone. Still has my resume fortunately but it sure has lost a lot of its convenience. Update 3/18 The app quit on me while I was updating resume in the middle of applying for an internship. Now I get to start over. Correction, app has seemed to crash and will not open anymore. Yay.

It used to work, at least somewhat, but since the last update I haven't been able to clear irrelevant jobs. It's never kept my extra search settings, so I have to keep redoing them every time. And even then, the filter is terrible; when I specify "exact location only" and jobs in English, it still gives me ones in French, and ones that require I relocate out to Alberta, Yellowknife, or even AUSTRALIA. And there is also no apparent screening of employers, given how many are thinly veiled scams.

The assessments that are on this app can be asked and taken multiple times once on the PC and then another time on this app which can be problematic because sometimes phones aren't as clearly visible as on the PC having to zoom in and out of the application can be problematic when answering said assessment tests why not just sync up the account so you don't have to retake a test that you already have listed as ??? preventing someone from getting a job they would possibly would have???!

I've had some really good luck finding jobs with indeed it's super easy to use it doesn't overwhelm your phone and you usually get a response from the employer within 24 hours or less. It's real easy to edit your resume and just use the resume you set up on the indeed app. I usually only apply to jobs that use that feature on the app that makes it way easier!!💪

The app has been helpful most of he last few years. But over the last few weeks, everything has fallen apart. Indeed signs me out regularly, right in the middle of me applying. It also deletes my recent searches and settings. I have been very vocal about recommending this app, but it is now causing me so many problems that the only reason I ever used it in the first place (user friendly interface, ease of one click apply, etc.) is going to be why I uninstall. I love Indeed. Please fix this.

title: My Work Clock
description:
Simple punch-in/punch-out clock & widget for tracking the time at work.

Features (very partial list):
* Overtime support
* Multiple jobs support
* Calendar update [Job Setting] add records to the calendar (it's recommended to open a separate calendar for 'My Work Clock'). ONE WAY-SYNC ONLY.
* Punch in/out directly from the widget
* Quick day, week & month information
* Simple reports
* Send to mail as CSV
* Add/remove/edit records
* Multiple overtime and report periods: daily, weekly, bi-weekly, monthly and more.

NOTES: 
* If the widget stops updating: make sure the application appears in your task killer 'white list'.
* No move-to-SD option: widgets do not work when an app is on the SD. We got many error reports from users so we disabled this option.

Required permissions reasoning:
*. READ CALENDAR EVENTS PLUS CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION
*. ADD OR MODIFY CALENDAR EVENTS AND SEND EMAIL TO GUESTS WITHOUT OWNERS' KNOWLEDGE
  == Required for Google calendar sync

*. MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS
  == Required to save CSV before sending by e-mail backup. 

*. FULL INTERNET ACCESS & VIEW NETWORK STATE
  == Required for bug report, analytics & ads.
descriptionHTML:
Simple punch-in/punch-out clock & widget for tracking the time at work.

Features (very partial list):
* Overtime support
* Multiple jobs support
* Calendar update [Job Setting] add records to the calendar (it's recommended to open a separate calendar for 'My Work Clock'). ONE WAY-SYNC ONLY.
* Punch in/out directly from the widget
* Quick day, week & month information
* Simple reports
* Send to mail as CSV
* Add/remove/edit records
* Multiple overtime and report periods: daily, weekly, bi-weekly, monthly and more.

NOTES:
* If the widget stops updating: make sure the application appears in your task killer 'white list'.
* No move-to-SD option: widgets do not work when an app is on the SD. We got many error reports from users so we disabled this option.

Required permissions reasoning:
*. READ CALENDAR EVENTS PLUS CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION
*. ADD OR MODIFY CALENDAR EVENTS AND SEND EMAIL TO GUESTS WITHOUT OWNERS' KNOWLEDGE
== Required for Google calendar sync

*. MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS
== Required to save CSV before sending by e-mail backup.

*. FULL INTERNET ACCESS & VIEW NETWORK STATE
== Required for bug report, analytics & ads.
summary: Simple punch-in/punch-out clock & widget for tracking the time at work.
recentChanges: Minor bug fixed
comments: This app is good but for me what would make it better is if it calculates my overtime on a daily basis. I work a split shift but over 8 hours is still overtime on a daily. Another thing is if it showed your schedule weekly instead of just scrolling down looking at everyday with no gaps between weeks. I downloaded this app because the one I normally use was having issues but they were corrected.

Tried a lot of apps and had trouble finding one that quickly gave me daily hours worked and weekly hours worked. It is exactly what I was looking for. I would like a few options for the theme, but still an amazing app.

Amazing app let's me track my hours and plan my week. The widget is a nice feature so I don't forget to clock in. ****please add the ability to add pay periods so instead of hours per month it's hour per 2 weeks or pay period****
Wonderful little app for just keeping track of the time you're working. Very user friendly and simple.
Great app. Easy to use, accurate time calculations, and intuitive.

title: Shift Work Calendar
description:
Do you work shifts?

Fed up of trying to work out what shift you will be working when asked about a future date?
Wouldn't it be nice to have an App close at hand to tell you!

Shift Work Calendar can be used to plan and organise your life around your work commitments.

Keep track of your life with this Shift Work Calendar, designed to make planning easier for people who work shifts.

Shift Work Calendar allows you to easily build different shift patterns by choosing your own colours and names which can be speedily added to the calendar and visible at a quick glance.

Features:
Custom labels can be created with unique colours and names.
Custom shift patterns can be created.
Shift patterns can be quickly added to the calendar automatically repeating for years if required.
Pay days can be quickly added to the calendar.
Calendar Colours can be changed for a personalised appearance.
Events can be added to the calendar to show appointments, meetings etc.
Events can have a notification / alarm reminder.
Calendars can be stored in the cloud for easy transfer between your devices.
Calendars can be shared with friends / family / colleagues using cloud share.
Multiple calendars can be stored.
A lock option can be enabled to stop accidental changes of the calendar.
Undo button allows mistakes to be rectified when adding labels to the calendar.
Search device option to easily import calendar files.

Pro Features:
Remove adverts.
Compare 2 calendars at the same time and find matching days.
Times can be added to labels to calculate hours worked.
Hours can be adjusted by date to calculate extra / lower hours.
Alarms based on shift pattern.
Send Shift Pattern by email.
Home screen Widget.

Email machaiapps@gmail.com for support. Feedback and suggestions are most welcome.

comments: This app is brilliant but does not allow me to edit or delete labels I have created. Is it necessary to buy the app in order to use this function? I'm happy to buy it. I just want to be sure I can edit & delete as and when I want. TUVM for the info. Updating solved the prob. One more thing the Pro version allows comparison with a 2nd calendar. I use a 2nd shift calendar on my phone and I'd like to be able to link them for comparison. Is that possible?

It would have been better if we had our own choice to write on the boxes as we work on different places and need reminder as to where we are working whether night or day in place x or place y. Otherwise the app is great but unfortunately it confines the timetable to one place only.

Iv paid for the full app but still can't work it properly I need to add mine and my partner's rotas , iv tried saving them so many times but will only show mine when I try to view calenders again only says mine ...it's driving me crazy ....😠
Although it states you can have a shift pattern repeat into the future it only repeats for a few months then stops. Would not rely on this app
Great little app. Once set up easy to use. Please don't change anything ! 🙂

title: HoursTracker: Time tracking for hourly work
description:
OVER 120,000 PEOPLE track their time and pay using HoursTracker ®. Try it today, and find out why it's the best and most highly-rated time tracker in Google Play!

Easily track your time and earnings, whether you're an hourly employee, a contractor, or you just want to better manage your working hours.

QUICK AND EASY time entry and editing make time tracking painless

• Record time using timers, complete with support for Breaks and Pauses

• Track your pay, including Tips, Mileage, and flexible ± time and earnings adjustments

• Pick any time to start, stop, break or pause the timer (7 minutes ago, 10 minutes from now, whatever you need)

• Set job locations and get clock in and out reminders when you arrive or leave or fully automate your time tracking (geofencing)

• Manually enter time entries with minimal effort thanks to smart, adaptive defaults

• Enter comments of any length with your time entries and optionally include them in your exports

◆ ADVANCED FEATURES and customization set HoursTracker above the rest

• Automatic daily and weekly overtime earnings calculations

• Built-in reports by Day, Week, and Month and support for most common pay period schedules

• Robust tagging and filtering allow you to build your own custom views

• Reminders when you've worked your target number of hours per day (even takes time rounding into account)

• Automatic time rounding: up, down, or to nearest (including 6 min)

• Ongoing notification lets you view time on the clock, even clock out take a break without launching the app

• CSV and formatted text export

• Cloud-based backup/restore with one re-usable backup slot included free (free account sign up is required)

• Web-based reporting access, including charts, graphs, desktop exports, and rolling backups available with optional subscription

• Customize your HoursTracker experience in the Preferences section under the More tab. Choose only one or many jobs clocked in at a time, opt-into prompts for comments, choose an elapsed time format (hours:minutes, or decimal hours), and more

"Free Edition" stores up to 3 jobs and 21 days of entries. For unlimited entries, upgrade to the "Personal" (up to 5 jobs) or "Pro" (unlimited jobs) edition. Or, erase older data and continue to use the "Free Edition" until you're ready to buy.

Visit our website at http://www.hourstrackerapp.com to learn more, and follow @HoursTracker on Twitter or facebook.com/HoursTracker to hear about upcoming features first.

If you have a question, problem, or need help, please send us a support request via e-mail.

comments: I love this app. It's very user friendly and easy to navigate. I like that you can customize and track your pay periods. The GPS/location clock in/ out capability is a major bonus- especially for someone like me who forgets. I initially started using the free version and after 2 weeks (which I believe is how many entries you can input with that version), realized it was going to be something I'd need/ use and bought the full version. Highly reccomend!

Overall great tool for managing your hours worked between several different jobs. Provides several options for adjusting overtime pay rate, and inputting no-taxable items like Meal Perdium. My only complaint would be that I seem to be unable to calculate hours worked in a week collectively amongst several different jobs, for the purposes of calculating overtime pay this app will only give you the overtime PER job.

Love this App, I've been using it for over a year now, it helps me keeping track of my hours worked. There's only one thing I reckon it's missing, I would love to be able to set a Weekend rate for every job I have in my account... I still need to manually change the pay rate every time I finish work on Saturday/Sunday. Hopefully dev can do something about it at some point :)

Love the app for all it does. I can keep track of different jobs in the same week, as I'm working them (at different rates). The "drag down on the the green bar" to edit or add filters does not work on my Galaxy 9+ though. Still highly recommended!

I use this app to track the hours I spend working on different projects and it has made the process so much simpler. The ability to make adjustments, pause and add breaks and comments all help me keep my timesheet accurate for my own sake and the sake of my clients.

title: Work Folders
description:
Work Folders is a location where you can store work files and access them from all of your PCs and devices, even when you’re offline.

To use Work Folders, your workplace has to enable your account first. After your account is enabled, you can set up the Work Folders app.

Features
• Access your work files and folders on your devices.
• Pin files so that you can view them while you're offline.
• Files are encrypted and protected by an app passcode, keeping others out.

comments: I'm at a loss as to why you would build an app with no practical purpose other than having READONLY files. You do know that work means actually doing something. Let's hope MS have again not lost interest and this improves soon!

Very poor execution of what could have so much promise. Lacks all the basic expected functionality of a cloud sync app. I wanted to use for KeePass DB but local files are encrypted and inaccessible to the device, can be opened via the app but read only! No share options in either direction. Sorry Microsoft but functionality is extremely lacking here :/
It takes ages just to sync the directory.
It was better to see in file sharing meun and else how to can sign out of it when it is logged in to switch user?
How do you authenticate the url for the organization to use and I have a sharepoint url?

title: My Shift Planner - Personal Shift Work Calendar
description:
My Shift Planner is designed for shift workers to help take back control of your work/life balance.
My Shift Planner is the most powerful Shift Work Calendar app on the market and the easiest to setup and use. Download today to gain back control of your social calendar!
220,000+ shift workers across the world are already enjoying our shift planning features, so why not give it a try?

Key Features:

-    Really EASY to set up.
-    Most common shift schedules are built-in for ease.
-    Sync with your device calendar.
-    Great for more complicated shift patters too! You can set up almost ANY roster.
-    Full Shift Customization features built in to suit your job
-    Record your Notes, Actual Worked Hours and Overtime against each day.
-    Is your Payslip correct? Check your hours against the Work Time Report to see!
-    Add your pay day to the calendar for ease
-    Share your calendar with colleagues, friends, or family.
-    Built-in, FREE backup tools to keep your data secure.

That's great, but what else does it give you?

-    Color coded calendar – for quick viewing of your month
-    Built in patterns for 4on/4off, On/Off, Dupont Schedules, Continental, Day/Night/Off, Nights Only, 2-2-2.
-       Support for custom shift schedules and complex rosters.
-       Home screen widget for today and 3 day view of shifts
-       Set up Repeating Patterns for any roster – even complex ones.
-    Calculate Worked Hours, Overtime and Vacation time for a week or month.
-    Record your Actuals Worked Hours against a shift.
-    Set reminders and customise alert sound effect.
-    Displays US national public holidays and options to show Canada, Australia, etc.
-    Add personal and work notes against each day.
-    Supports split-shifts and 24 hour shifts.
-    Record vacation, rest days, overtime, on-call, training, and pay days.
-    Day, night, evening, early, late, long day, midday, split-shifts and more included.
-    Fully customisable shifts, times and colors.
-    Dark and Light style to suit you.
-    Work on both cell phones and tablets, Android 5 or above.
-    Built in backup and restore via your free MyShiftPlanner account.
-    Email and share your shift pattern with colleagues, friends and family.
-    Choose the start day of your week. (Sun-Sat).
-    12 / 24 hour clock
-    Regular updates with new features, fixes, and improvements.

The additional Pro Pack also gives you extra power and more shift work features:

-    Sync your work rota with your device calendar (e.g. Google Calendar)
-    Track your vacation time and remaining days
-    View a Work Time Report to track weekly/month overtime or hours
-    Set up repeating pay schedules within your calendar
-    Live Share your calendar with other MyShiftPlanner users (e.g. family, colleagues or friends)
-    And much more!

My Shift Planner is Designed for all shift workers. Including:

- Police
- Firefighters 
- Nurses
- Doctors
- Subway Workers
- Miners
- Oil Field Workers
- Bus and Coach Drivers
- Pilots and Airline Crew
- Airport Workers (Baggage Handlers, Check-in Crew, Security and More!)
- Call Centre Workers
- Retail Workers
- Emergency Workers
- Military
- Paramedics
- Security Guards
- Cleaners
- Bartenders
- Waiters and Waitresses
- Everybody who works random hours and days.

We have a first-class support team waiting to help you, so if you experience problems installing or using My Shift Planner, please contact us via the Facebook page or support@myshiftplanner.com

Please give us the opportunity to help solve your issues before submitting bad reviews. We're here to help you and want to show you why we're so proud of My Shift Planner.

recentChanges: This update improves the Android 10 support of MyShiftPlanner, and fixes a few minor bugs reported by our users.
comments: If possible, would be nice if it can compute the wage/salary based on weekly, fortnight or monthly. Also, when using special characters on the "Note" section, its not showing up, specifically the "and" special character.
So easy to use and makes it clear for you to see your schedule. Especially being able to change the colours, names etc. Love it!
Great app. Can see what days I'm working months ahead, once I had put my work rota in. Fast response from friendly makers to for help and info. Well worth having 👍😁

I purchased the Full version. I am doing freelance so each day is booked for different companies thus timings, rates, breaks, booking agent differ - it is impossible to remember all these. With this app it is easy to edit and arrange different shifts and notes for each of them. I make use of "connect with another account" so that my partner will be notified of any changes to my plans then & there (this function is just basic -pls develop it as a phone notification when other account update)

Love the ease of updating shifts on this app. In previous apps, I had to tap to cycle through the different shifts on each day until I got to the one I needed. With this, I simply select the shift and tap the day to add. The only thing I am struggling with is setting a pattern. My husband has a 96 week perpetual roster, which has just changed from the previous roster. I added the amended 96 weeks manually, then tried to select the pattern from the day it starts to the day it repeats, but it's not working. It seems to be overlaying the previous roster from 2019-2020 to these dates, instead of using the 2020-2021 roster. Not sure if it's a glitch or I'm doing something wrong (I'm also having problems with my keyboard not showing up if I need to change shift names). That said, I'm incredibly impressed with this app. UPDATE: Thanks for the quick feedback on my questions. All my questions answered with viable solutions.

title: Make money free - Work at home & online jobs
description:
A Collection of 86 Legitimate Ways to Make Money Online and Work from Home!

If you’ve been on the internet for more than a few hours, you’ve likely seen at least one advertisement teaching you how to make thousands of dollars a minute, working from your underwear, in the comfort of your own home.

These ads are so ridiculously popular that if you’re like most people, you start doubting whether it really is possible to make money online.

The truth is, it is possible. It might be hard to make thousands of dollars a minute from the get-go (or at all), but there are certainly legitimate ways you can make an extra $100 a day working from home with ease.

In this App, We are going to share 86 different ways in which you can create more income. We have tried to cover all types of methods for all different personality and skill types, and We are confident that you’ll be able to find at least a few that sound good to you.

While some of them require more work than others, please know that you can mix and match. For example, maybe you can do a few hours of forum moderation at $10 an hour for $30, and then make up the extra $70 doing something else. The key is to have fun and do whatever you enjoy! 

We have given an overview of each idea, and then fleshed them all out a little bit so you could get started on whatever you like, immediately.

It is my sincere hope that you get a lot out of this App, and that you take action and start making money!


Complete App Features:

>> 86 Tips on how to Make Money
>> Easy Browsing of Tips
>> Mark Any Tip as Favourite
>> Share Any Tip via Email, Facebook and SMS.
>> Change Font Size for Easy Reading
>> Fast Loading Pages
>> No Internet Connection Required
>> Universal App (Works with almost all Android Phones and Tablets)

Without any further ado, let’s get started.

Download This App Now it's FREE!

title: Contractor's Work: Built for Contractors
description:
An app built for the construction industry! Simplifying technology for our peers in the construction industry is our goal! From giving you the ability to create, store, share and get your work rated in seconds, to helping you post jobs or get the right people to apply to your jobs is just a small part of this application. We have made it very simple for our users to submit invoices in seconds without any technological know how on their part, as well as the ability to mark images to point out the issues that need to be fixed without misunderstandings.

Our goal as mentioned above is to streamline the entire construction industry into the palm of your hands with a community of veteran contractors to newcomers who keep impressing us with their skills and capabilities. It's time the construction industry has it's own place for contractors, laborers, masons, painters, roofers, plumbers, framers, and anyone that works with their hands.

Is this contractor app easy to use? 

Contractor’s Work comes with a clean design and the interface is user-friendly. Once you open this construction app for the first time, you get to create a profile and set up your portfolio(s) to share your work and experiences.

Why should I install this construction industry app?

If you ever wanted an easier, cleaner way to create, store, share, and get your work rated, then Contractor's Work is the place to go! We are also building the biggest directory for the construction industry and no contractor will ever have to pay for leads or percentages of the jobs they get! Our commitment is truly for the hardworking man and woman and it is because the creator of the application himself is a roofer from Pennsylvania and truly understands how hardworking our fields are. 

Download Contractor’s Work for free and share your experiences with clients and other workers. It’s free, secure and easy to use.

Contractor’s Work Main Features at a Glance:
•       Portfolio ratings
•       Create PDF files
•       Share PDF files
•       Post jobs
•       Apply for jobs
•       Highlight areas on blue prints or images
•	Clean, neat design with a fresh and intuitive interface
•	Useful for both clients and contractors
•	Powerful portfolio builder
•	Fully encrypted messaging

descriptionHTML:
An app built for the construction industry! Simplifying technology for our peers in the construction industry is our goal! From giving you the ability to create, store, share and get your work rated in seconds, to helping you post jobs or get the right people to apply to your jobs is just a small part of this application. We have made it very simple for our users to submit invoices in seconds without any technological know how on their part, as well as the ability to mark images to point out the issues that need to be fixed without misunderstandings.

Our goal as mentioned above is to streamline the entire construction industry into the palm of your hands with a community of veteran contractors to newcomers who keep impressing us with their skills and capabilities. It's time the construction industry has it's own place for contractors, laborers, masons, painters, roofers, plumbers, framers, and anyone that works with their hands.

Is this contractor app easy to use?

Contractor’s Work comes with a clean design and the interface is user-friendly. Once you open this construction app for the first time, you get to create a profile and set up your portfolio(s) to share your work and experiences.

Why should I install this construction industry app?

If you ever wanted an easier, cleaner way to create, store, share, and get your work rated, then Contractor's Work is the place to go! We are also building the biggest directory for the construction industry and no contractor will ever have to pay for leads or percentages of the jobs they get! Our commitment is truly for the hardworking man and woman and it is because the creator of the application himself is a roofer from Pennsylvania and truly understands how hardworking our fields are.

Download Contractor’s Work for free and share your experiences with clients and other workers. It’s free, secure and easy to use.

Contractor’s Work Main Features at a Glance:
• Portfolio ratings
• Create PDF files
• Share PDF files
• Post jobs
• Apply for jobs
• Highlight areas on blue prints or images
• Clean, neat design with a fresh and intuitive interface
• Useful for both clients and contractors
• Powerful portfolio builder
• Fully encrypted messaging
• Perfect companion for contractors, sub-contractors, laborers, masons, painters, roofers, plumbers, electricians, and framers
• Create a professional website for your small business (no coding needed)
• Share your experiences with the world and promote your small business
• Instant feed to find contractors (local contractors)
• Add posts to your timeline
• Free with no disturbing ads or in-app purchase items

Become a part of the first true ecosystem created for the construction industry and help us bring everything together under one roof.

Check out our website if you have any questions or concerns:
http://www.contractors-work.com/contact_us

title: Make Money: Passive Income & Work From Home Ideas
description:
Make Money contains 60 legitimate, sustainable ways to earn extra money online. 

Whether you want to learn how to make money at home, become an entrepreneur or generate passive income, you’ll find a huge variety of home business & money making ideas to help you achieve financial success! 

With tons of information and in-depth guides for each money making strategy, you’ll learn the pros and cons, requirements and steps you should take to successfully launch your new home business and earn extra income. 

Explore some of the most popular ways to earn money working from home as an entrepreneur or freelancer, such as affiliate marketing, blogging, self-publishing eBooks, dropshipping and so much more! 

No matter what your skills or limitations, with our list of 60 ways to make money, you’re bound to find something that suits you! 

------------------------------------------------
TIPS, TRICKS & FEATURES!
------------------------------------------------

- Explore over 60 methods & jobs based on your skills, passions and available time

- In-depth details and instructions on how to make money from home

- Discover a huge variety of tested, proven methods

- Turn your passions and skills into a successful freelance career with this guide

- Learn how to become a successful entrepreneur

- Build a secondary income stream and achieve financial freedom from home!

- Explore the most popular methods to earn money such as affiliate marketing, blogging, dropshipping & self-publishing

The guides you’ll find in this app aren’t get rich quick schemes, they are legitimate, sustainable and proven ways to earn money. Some people do these jobs full-time, and some spend time outside of their workday to do this. 

There are already thousands of people making money online using these strategies – are you ready to join them?

Making money from home is possible with one of our proven methods – but you will need to invest some time and effort. It’s not always easy money! 

You don’t have to worry where to start because we will provide you all the information you need to kickstart your new career as a freelancer or entrepreneur – what are you waiting for?

Time to get inspired and discover your potential!

START MAKING EXTRA INCOME NOW – DOWNLOAD FOR FREE! b>

title: Work Tasks Pro
description:
Business professionals need to know the status of critical processes and make quick decisions on the go. Work Tasks Pro app for Workflow Management is a premium application for mobile devices, which allows authenticated users to securely access and act upon work items on the move.

Features

• View and submit fill forms and work items
• Fill and submit a form to initiate a process
• Set a Form as a landing page for the app
• View all work items or view work items from one of the categories
• View work item details and remove the work item from the list
• Approve or reject a request
• Search for work items in the app and on the server
• Flag work items based on importance or for reference
• Identify the priority of work items based on the color code
• Group work items based on the value of work item field
• Sort work items based on priority
• View queue items
• Pick, allocate, move, prioritize, or recall a queue item
• Receive real-time notifications
• Localization support for various languages

title: Work from home jobs: online business 🏠 job online
description:
Work from home job is considered as the holy grail for many - work wherever and whenever you like with an amazing flexibility and limitless possibilities.
Work from home job can be a small online business like a drop shipping business or something smaller and easier like doing online typing jobs.
We hope that this free internet business short course will give you a taste of what’s 
possible and will open your minds towards wealthy and easier life.

Main lessons of our course are:
#1 Network Marketing and MLM
There are thousands оf реорlе in thе MLM induѕtrу аnd if уоu саn find a product уоu bеliеvе in, соmmit to оrdеring it еvеrу mоnth, аnd share it with оthеr уоu will dо well in Network Marketing. Thе biggest MLM tiр we саn givе уоu iѕ tо rеmеmbеr thаt building a network marketing company iѕ a lоng tеrm strategy. Always kеер уоur biggеr viѕiоn in mind аnd juѕt dоn’t givе uр before уоu see rеѕultѕ.

#2 Direct Sales 
Of аll thе wауѕ to work from home thаt will gеt уоu intо рrоfit quickly, direct sales iѕ рrоbаblу thе bеѕt. But it dоеѕ rеԛuirе a relatively high соѕt tо jоin соmраrеd tо network marketing. Dirесt Sаlеѕ iѕ ѕоmеtimеѕ соnfuѕеd аѕ a network marketing соmраnу bесаuѕе оf thе lеvеrаgе уоu саn сrеаtе with it, but it iѕ nоt network marketing.

#3 Blogging as an online business
If уоu likе tо wrote аnd уоu hаvе a passion fоr a сеrtаin tорiс, thеn blogging is аnоthеr of thе mаnу wауѕ to work frоm hоmе. We love blogging аnd hаvе bееn dоing it fоr уеаrѕ аbоut mоm stuff аnd hеаlth tорiсѕ. Hоwеvеr if уоu wаnt tо mаkе money from blogging, thеrе аrе few things уоu ѕhоuld knоw (Some lеаrnеd thе hаrd wау).

#4 Revenue Sharing
Revenue sharing is the distribution of profits and losses between you to another partner that can be a seller, manufacturer etc.
Revenue sharing in Internet marketing is also known as cost per sale, in which the cost of advertising is determined by the revenue generated as a result of the advertisement itself. This method accounts for about 80% of affiliate marketing programs, primarily dominated by online retailers such as Amazon and eBay.

#5 Drop shipping
Drop shipping is a method that allows you to sell products even though you don’t have them physically. The way it works is that after the sale was made (online usually) the product is being shipped from a third party seller or manufacturer, directly to the customer.

#6 Stock market investing
The stock market can bring amazing opportunities, but only for those who can take the time to learn how to do it wisely.
If you are willing to put in the time we will teach you how you can grow your money through stock market investing, we have free courses for you:
1. Basic stock market investing course
2. Day trading free course
3. How to generate passive income through the stock market

#7 Generate Passive income
Financial independence and financial freedom are the ultimate goal for many of us, while thinking about financial planning and wealth engagement.

To make your life easier, we’ve added an in-app, notebook and also we’ve added a weekly reminder that will help you finish the course

Download now!

title: Work Shift Calendar
description:
This app is designed for shift workers and people who need to organize their day to day basis and thus not to miss any appointments.

You can carry out an exhaustive control of your working day and your income quick and easily thanks to our statistics system.


SHIFTS 📆

- Create fully configurable shifts ✏️
- Add your workday, with option to include split shift and rest time. Keep track of your schedules 📊
- Enter your income, overtime and early exit. Set up earnings and control working time easily 💰
- Create alarms associated with that shift (for that day or for the previous day) and customize its sound 🔔
- Include actions at the beginning or end of the schedule of each shift (WIFI, sound mode, Bluetooth) 🔇
- Paint up to two shifts per day.
- Import your shifts from one calendar to another.
- Add customizable icons associated with a date.


NOTES 📝

- Create notes on each day and add reminders with alarms. Don't ever forget important appointments or notes 🔔
- Customize the sound of alarms.
- Include images and handmade drawings in your notes ️


WIDGETS 📲

- Create a widget for your desktop and view your calendar even without opening the app.
- Choose between weekly and monthly Widget.
- Choose the size you like more.


TOP FUNCTIONS 🚀

- Enjoy the Monthly and Annual View (which allows you to see all months of the year just by sliding the screen, as well as Annual Statistics).
- Export your calendar to Google calendar.
- Add national holidays directly from Google Calendar 🌴
- Control working time and earnings by selecting a range of dates in the Statistics section.
- View upcoming notes at a glance.
- Compare different calendars.
- Share your calendar (monthly, annual view or comparison of calendars) with your friends via WhatsApp, email, Telegram ... 📧
- Create backups easily.
- Set up to ten different calendars.
- Import other calendars simply.
- Use the icon search to find them quickly 🔎


EASY TO USE

- Modify your calendar in two ways:
(1) Quick mode or Paint: Select an event from the drop-down list and click on the days to paint them with that event 🎨
(2) Edit Mode: Select one or more days and perform actions in the selected day range (repeat, copy, cut, paste, delete or assign shifts) ✂ ✂️

- Shifts menu: you can see all the shifts of that calendar, create new ones, edit, reorder or import them.


FEATURED FEATURES

- Easy to use.
- Clear interface.
- Customizable.
- PRO version that unlocks great advantages.
- Tutorial with the basic functions of the app and help section (FAQs)
- Fast and personalized customer service ℹ️
- Social networks 👍 enjoy explanatory videos, information about new updates and more visual content by joining our Shifter community.


SUPPORT OUR WORK 💜

We are a very small team of people who make a great effort to develop Shifter. If you like this app, you can help us improving it and continue adding new features. Buying PRO version not only activates all its advantages, but also greatly support the continuous development of the app.


FACEBOOK & INSTAGRAM: @WorkShiftCalendar

comments: Has the best wiget! So far I have been using this for a month, it's been pretty good at a glance on my home page... Easy to apply as an appointment scheduling and shifts. Pretty happy, some things I would like improved, but overall it has met my expectations from the description.

I bought the pro version so I can sync it to Google calendar. Now my wife can see my work schedule. It took me maybe 15 minutes to set up a custom calendar for the year, I tried using Google calendar and it was a nightmare. Love the app! Thanks for all your hardwork. I'll use this as long as I can.

Despite giving access to all the requested permissions, the alarm still doesn't activate; in some cases the alarm will activate for 2 seconds before disabling itself. Seeing as how I use this app as a wake up alarm for work, this feature is crucial and necessary for my continued use. Been late to work 3 times recently due to the alarm not activating or continuing to sound off until I disable it.
This app is excellent and working again now I have updated my Android OS with the latest software update. Excellent for allowing easy editing of shifts and the paint feature is excellent.
Great app (good enough that I even bought the full version) but as far as I can tell, it's missing the ability to set a monthly cycle, like 'every 15th is fight club' and set it for every month

comments: It is very much in a beta looking stage. While it may look clunky there are postings that are basically just mirrored ads from Indeed. Yet what I find curious is that I applied to 1 gig through this app. Robo calls started. Weird. Why is that Dev?

9/4/19 Developer provided additional information. I was unaware all listings were remote as they were not when I first reviewed the app. We can now search for type but filters would be optimal to sort through variables. Developer, please add instructions for user. Also, expand your reach on the net to include more jobs. A quick search on the net yielded 3000 remote positions at Indeed. Thank you for the communication.
really easy use and its so nice to be able to find remote job postings without having to spend a ton of time sorting through other listings. I wish I had known this was available months ago
Useful app. Wishlist: allow for searching all supported sites at once rather than one at a time

Brilliant app! I have spent weeks scrawling across many paid and free job sites and havent found anywhere near as many relevant jobs as I found here in 5 mins. Would strongly recommend to anyone looking for a new remote job!

title: MaintainX Work Orders and Procedures
description:
MaintainX is a fast and easy to use mobile work order and procedure software.

It is a simple and intuitive CMMS.

1) Creating a work order is as simple as snapping a photo
2) Message directly on work orders to keep your communication organized
3) See all work orders in one place and get beautiful reports
4) Track your assets, locations and work order history

Sign Up Today For a Free Account!

MaintainX is ideal for: 

1) Facility managers 
2) Property managers
3) Restaurant managers 
4) Manufacturing managers 

Perfect for teams looking to boost communication and get instant mobile/desktop status updates between technicians, maintenance workers, and managers.

Time to get rid of pen, paper forms, and clunky software!

summary: The CMMS you always wish you had for maintenance, frontline and industrial teams
recentChanges:
1.45

- Introducing a brand new design for procedures as well as for asset and location screens! All feedback welcome. :)
- Improved the experience around setting a due date on a work order.
- Added options when exporting a work order to PDF or when sending it to vendors.
- Now showing assets at a location on the location details screen.
- A phone number is no longer mandatory for users that are activating through an email invite.
- Many other improvements, polishes and bug fixes.
comments: Absolutely simplified my work life. Amazing app, really helpful and useful. Updates are frequent and aren't merely cosmetic or bug fixes, as they are adding useful features all time. MaintainX is a joy to use, and by far the easiest (and most useful) app I've used in my 21 years in the telecommunications field for work orders/management/team collaboration. Definitely recomend this app to any business owners looking to streamline workflow and simplify life for administration and employees!

Since we started using this application. We have a better organizational approach to what is needed, to get our tasks handled in a timely matter. We can prioritize tasks, and catorgrize the tasks as well. Anytime we had questions or suggestions we received a timely response and assistance. They are constantly making changes to better address user suggestions for improvement.

I work for a carwash chain that I cover 68 locations and this app makes it so much better for me and my team to control and know what is going on at the locations. I highly recommend this software for any one who has multiply sites and or team members they deal with.

At first use, it asks for a name and telephone number. The number box does not enter any numbers ("enter a valid number" ) and therefore you can't start. I have re-loaded and re-booted the phone (Huawei) and it still doesn't work. Big shame as it looked like a useful app. Disappointed

Fantastic app. It has helped our company organize our maintenance and keep better track of our assets. The MaintainX team has been super helpful and has provided us with any help we've needed. They are a very active team and seem to be constantly improving their app. Can't thank them enough.

title: Free Employee Scheduler & Time Tracker by Homebase
description:
HOMEBASE HELPS WITH:

📅 Building and sharing your schedule: Everyone can view their most up-to-date work schedule, submit their availability, see who’s free to cover shifts, and request trades.

⏰ Time tracking: Employees can clock in and out for shifts right from the mobile app or on computers or tablets in your office. Managers can easily track breaks, overtime, and timesheets for payroll.  

👏 Managing employee performance: Employees get helpful reminders of upcoming shifts, and managers get notified if employees are late, miss clock-outs, or reach overtime.

🗣 Improving team communication: Our built-in messaging keeps your team in sync without exchanging phone numbers. 

📈 Tracking business performance: Get a real-time view of your labor costs and sales—from anywhere. 

⚖️ Labor law compliance: Get help to stay compliant with labor and scheduling laws and  protect your business from fines and lawsuits.


EMPLOYEES CAN:
• Clock in and out on their smartphones
• View their up-to-date work schedule
• View the hours they’ve worked and estimated earnings
• Request and accept shift trades & covers
Submit their availability and time-off requests
• Create group chats and chat with teammates in real time
• Receive shift reminders so they’re on time for shifts
• Manage their contact and profile information
• Sign in with mobile phone number or email address

MANAGERS CAN:
• Build team work schedules from the in-app schedule maker
• View team availability and time-off requests while building the shift schedule 
• View clock-in status of employees, and add or edit employee timecards
• Check sales, scheduled labor costs, actual labor costs, and labor as a % of sales right in the team management app
• See who's available to be called in to work and easily contact them
• Message employees in real time in one-on-one or group chats
• Get alerts when employees are late or reach overtime
• Use Homebase on the web to set up advanced policies, controls, and permissions

Homebase integrates with popular payroll providers to make running payroll a breeze. Employee timesheets are automatically formatted for easy import.

Gusto
Intuit Quickbooks Online Payroll
Square Payroll
Heartland
ADP 
SurePayroll
And more

Homebase also integrates with leading point-of-sale systems, so your employees can clock in and out for shifts right from your POS.

Clover
Square
Toast
Revel
Lightspeed
Upserve 
And more

Homebase provides US-based phone, email, and chat support free to all businesses, and our mobile app is free for managers and employees. To learn more, visit joinhomebase.com.

recentChanges: NEW: Subscribe to the Plus plan right from the app
comments: The app has potential but needs a lot of work. The chat automatically refreshea and sends you to the bottom and is VERY VERY ANNOYING when you are trying to scroll up to read missed texts and ppl are typing at the same time. It honestly made me very angry at times. Another thing is that I see a lot of "unsupported message type" in the chats and I have no idea what that means. The all isn't bad but a lot of basic features needs a refresh ASAP.

The app keeps crashing ever since the new update. I cannot see anything my coworkers type, nor can I respond to them. I've tried everything and the app is still broken. It worked great before the new update, I just wish I could use it again.

Glitchy, notifications of the same messages over and over. Shift trades disappear before they get approved. Been using this app for the past year. Now I'm not getting any notification about employee messages
This app is amazing it's helped me in so many ways I absolutely love that I can keep up with my coworkers and bosses plus having your schedule at all times it is extremely handy.

App doesn't allow me to write or respond to messages using more than like 5 words. Very inconvenient as a means of communication. I recently took over managing a company and am unable to communicate with my staff through this.

title: Work Log - Work Hours Tracking
description:
Work Log - Work Hours Tracking is a simple and compact utility that helps to keep track of working hours of your shift. 

It helps to add your shift or punch in and punch out your shift. You can view your shift details by pay period, week, month, year and all. It also calculate your wages, expenses, overtime, deduction, bonus, sales, tips and many others as per app setting and user needs.  

 Work Log - Work Hours Tracking App features :
• Simple and easy to use interface.
• Add your shift manually or punch in and punch out your shift.
• Shows shift details and paycheck calculation all, pay period wise, week wise, month wise, and year wise.
• You can sort shift details by shift start date time or no of working hours.
• Flexible setting for wages, tracking sales, tips, expenses.
• You can also calculate overtime by setting overtime detail from settings. 
• You can add deductions and bonus in your paycheck as per your need.
descriptionHTML:
Work Log - Work Hours Tracking is a simple and compact utility that helps to keep track of working hours of your shift.

It helps to add your shift or punch in and punch out your shift. You can view your shift details by pay period, week, month, year and all. It also calculate your wages, expenses, overtime, deduction, bonus, sales, tips and many others as per app setting and user needs.

summary: A simple work hour tracking utility helps to add and track your working shifts.
recentChanges:
- minor bug fixed
*** Now you can generate Excel report of shift details. (It is a Pro Version feature)
** Added setting option for different date display format.
** Added more currency symbols.
** Added Setting options for 24hour format and Hour display format (decimal hour / hour and minute).
- Simple and compact utility that helps to keep track of working hours of your shift
- Shows shift details and paycheck calculation all, pay period wise, week wise, month wise, and year wise.
comments: This app has great potential but it lacks features which would increase usability. For instance you need to create each day individually always selecting the hour and minute. There should be an easy way to duplicate a previous day or even duplicate an entire week or pay period. Most people work the same 40 hour week and having to individually populate a day makes this app a hassle to use. Would be nice to see this feature added in the future. Besides this the app is clean and easy to use.

This so the only app I could find that calculates overtime correctly. The only thing I would ask for is to allow for different wages. If you work two jobs or work at two different locations that pay differently this feature would have to be added so that you could track everything. Otherwise a great app and definitely worth the price to upgrade to pro! I'll edit this review and give it five stars when we get the option to allow different wages.

I recently changed my device and my pro plan is not activated even though I am under the same Google account. It is unacceptable to request re-purchase in this case. Please fix this and advise me accordingly. Thank you.

Just what I needed... however additional deductions of $ value should be included like national insurance and health surcharge are flat rates which are deducted from pay... those should be included with the percentage tax deduction... but great app, thanks!
A great app to keep track of the hours at work. It also acts like a diary, reviewing the type of work done on that certain time. Thumbs up to engineer of this app...thanks alot.

title: WFS: Making Work Easy
description:
Keep up to date with when you're working with WFS: Making Work Easy 

This app connects to your employer’s scheduling system so that you know when and where you are working. 

With WFS you can:
- Keep up to date with new schedules and schedule changes as they're published, so there are no unwelcome surprises.
- Let your employer know when you are available to work and how to contact you, so you don't miss out on shifts.
- Offer to work extra shifts that your manager makes available, boosting your earnings.
- Request and see your time off, so that you can plan your weeks.

This app requires your employer to use WFS for scheduling. 

To activate your WFS: Making Work Easy account, please click the link in your registration email. 

If you can’t find your registration email, please check your junk folder or speak to your manager.

On first opening the app, use the registration code contained in the registration email.

Note: Some app features may not have been enabled by your employer..

summary: Own your working week!
recentChanges: Minor bug fixes
comments: I've used this app for 6 months now and as of Monday I can no longer access the app anymore unless I use a registration code.I shouldn't have to harrass my manager for a new registration code EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. the app updates. PLEASE fix it so I'll I have to do is log back in, every app on the planet has this feature so it can't be that difficult.

I've been using this app for the last couple yrs or so and up until today (12-15-19) it had been working great. When i got on it today, it said i was new to the app and had to register with my store's code...don't remember it and when i did try a code, nothing. It's still trying to load. Very frustrating.

Worked for 2 years then suddenly says I am new and needed to register. When I found my old code, it only gave me 2 weeks of my schedule and says I have not been scheduled. When it works it is great. Also wish I could look at past schedules.

Every time there is an update the app wants a registration code why can't I just sign in like with every other apk on the planet? Also if you complain on Google play store the automatic reply is that they are Keen to solve your problem. Who talks like that? Contact your manager for the code??? Complete lack of support.

We have had this app for work for a few years now and it's terrible. It hardly ever works properly, there's no consistent forms of IT support or annual updates, half of our employees don't show up and the other half contain people we have fired from our store weeks ago. Also if an employee does not have the app, they will sometimes not show on the schedule. Awful attempt at a good idea, wish we would switch to something else.

recentChanges:

comments: Awesome app for my company (plumbing, heating and air conditioning) to use to keep track of all of our new construction jobs. We're able to put in and schedule all the job phases, what employees will be working on them, cost of materials and hours clocked at each stage of the job, record "extras" and change orders as needed, per new build. I'm able to schedule and keep track and update wherever I'm at, whether in the office on my desktop computer or out of the office from my mobile/tablet.

Amazing for our game development studio. All the tools you could ever need to implement Agile into your company. User friendly, thoughtful and inspiring design. Cute icons and small touches to keep everyone motivated. Also allows for exporting data and easy task viewing. Everyone knows what needs to be done at all times and is always notified. An incredible service for the price.

I was excited to try the app for our team's project, but it proved completely unusable on Android. Stuck in a login loop. Tried registering twice, the first time my account was registered and then I could not login as it did not exist in the db. The second, I log in and immediately as I try to interact with the UI get logged out again...

It's perfect, but there is one thing.. Why can't I do something in the application like create or edit the tasks while not connected to the internet .. I should work in the offline mode of the net and then when I open the net the sync takes place.
Using this app for lead management.. not often you find software that meets all your needs and is so customizable. Bonus, it's pretty! Highly recommended.

title: Work Classic
description:
Fleetmatics WORK Mobile is field service management in the palm of your hand. A key component of the complete Fleetmatics WORK solution, this app provides your employees with the tools to increase service, satisfaction and overall productivity when they are in the field.
	•	Instantly see new work assigned and job details.
	•	Track your time, including travel and job start and finish.
	•	Fill out forms on a mobile device. No more lost paperwork.
	•	Capture and store customer’s signatures at job completion
	•	Create quotes and invoices instantly in the field.
	•	Give your drivers real-time directions to the next job from Maps.
	•	Get status updates from field workers at a job. Spot issues before they happen.
	•	Inventory management lets you see stock levels in the office and the vehicle.
 
Please Note: You must be a Fleetmatics WORK customer to use this app.  Not a Fleetmatics WORK customer yet? Contact us to find out more.  US: 877 376 6622, Australia: 1800 835 117,  New Zealand: 04 831 8850, UK: 0203 519 2245.

recentChanges: Bug Fixes.
comments: Well they took mine down from earlier this summer so here it goes again. They're not supporting this app any longer. But this one does what the newer app doesn't, which is allow for custom screens with questions that need replies to before you can finish the job. And the fact that I can search all completed work not just what I've been assigned to is why I use this one along with the other... Why should I need 2 apps to do job of 1? The picture option is horrible on this one as they all look blurry when trying to find an old pic that was taken instead of adding picture while I'm in front of the unit. Searching for pics after the fact is all but useless and obsurred. The new app does a good job of picture adding. Verizon needs to get it together in order to compete in a market where we have other options.
App has a tendency to freeze and touch buttons seem to be slightly off and overly sensitive.

my company issued us a iPad for each truck and they also told us to download the app on our phones the app does not work on the iPad but so far it's working on my phone I still don't like it And everybody in the company that uses this app says the same thing. It's garbage
Shows new jobs on the tab but doesn't display the jobs
App has loading problems.

title: Care@Work Benefits by Care.com
description:
Access employer provided family care benefits and connect with local caregivers for your family. The Care@Work app by Care.com gives 24/7, on-the-go access to care—for both last minute and planned needs.

Company benefits may include access to:
* Child Care—including babysitters, nannies, daycare and more
* Adult & Senior Care—including personal care, transportation, senior housing and more
* Pet Care—dog walkers, pet sitters, boarding and grooming
* Housekeeping—cleaning services, errands and odd jobs
* Tutoring—individuals and centers
* Backup Care—for last minute needs in caring for children or adults

To use the Care@Work app, you must be enrolled in your company’s Care.com employee benefits program. If you have not yet enrolled, your HR department can provide you with your company’s Care.com enrollment page.

If your company does not offer benefits from Care.com, you can download our Care.com app to find and manage your care needs on-the-go.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I've used this app to book backup care probably 10 times over the past couple years. Once all my kids' details were in there, booking care has always been fast and easy. One of the times I even used it to book someone to come the same day. I'm not someone who loves doing things over the phone so this has been great-- plus it's faster because I know all my info is already in the app, saving me having to answer questions over the phone.

This app SUCKS and never works. It works flawlessly on iOS, but not android. Do I really have to buy an iPhone just for this stupid app? Seriously, android has tons more users than iOS. Take care of this app as much as you do on iOS. I just wanted to book a care center for me kids on a certain day and this thing would never work. It launches just fine, but when I hit the "call us" button, the app force closes every freaking time. I had to borrow my wife's iPhone to complete my request. This is messed up. Now, I can't even check the status of my request. Every time I wanted to I'd have to borrow her iPhone again. WTH.
I use this app frequently through my company provided backup care. Its amazing to have this access to my benefit when I am in a pinch and need to find a solution on the go!

Every single time ive attempted to use this app. They cant ever find care givers and i was told it was at the time i put in the request but ive even put in a request 11 hours before ive even needed the care (which totally doesnt make sense considering this is supposed to be emergency care) and i still couldnt get care.
I used this app to book a babysitter quickly when my normal babysitter called in sick. This service really helped me out of a jam. So glad my wife gets this benefit from her job.

title: ExpressJobs Job Search & Apply
description:
Job search with the ExpressJobs app from Express Employment Professionals. Express has thousands of jobs in Administrative/Office Services, Commercial/Light Industrial, and Professional fields. Find a job that fits your skills, experience, and criteria. Available jobs in your area are marked on the map to show proximity. Save jobs that interest you, and tap to apply for jobs in minutes!

Once you’re placed in that perfect job for you, you’ll be able to see your work schedule, communicate with your Express representative throughout your job journey, log your work hours, submit timesheets, and much more—all within the ExpressJobs app.

Download the free ExpressJobs app, build your profile, and start your job search with Express today!

Features:
•	Customized results for your skills and requirements
•	Save your profile for one-touch job application
•	Mapping function shows you the jobs available in your area
•	Your job search history is automatically saved 
•	Save jobs to your Watch List
•	Share jobs with your friends via social media
•	Choose your preferred form of contact
•	Up-to-date notifications on positions and job details
•	Easy access to work assignment history and documents, such as your job history and employment forms
•	View your schedule, clock in and out, submit timecards, and more

Three things I would love to see from W2W to help do this are: - The ability to have my schedule automatically sync with my Google Calendar. Or something of the sort. - A sleeker, and more lag free experience. Right now, theres a three second minimum buffer between when I click a button and anything happening. - Push notifications, so that I'm notified about messages & changes to the schedule.

It would be nice if you guys can dumb things down a bit so those simple minded can better use this app. So it's not to complicated to get to where you wanna go. It should be as simple as opening the app and with just a single click you are on the screen you wanna see.

title: Work Order Assigner
description:
Work Order Assigner App is specifically designed to manage tasks. Easily create tasks and assign them to particular employees, provide details and time frames. After any task is assigned the assignee can login into the app using his/her credentials and see it, once it is completed assignee can add notes about it which will become immediately available to the manager.

Summary app features include:
• Upload and edit your own PDF form or document from local storage or cloud drives
• Fill in your PDF forms
• Print forms
• Share forms via email and messages
• Upload forms to cloud drives
• Sync collected data across multiple devices
• Save and view generated reports on your device

If you are not satisfied with our pre-built form solution, you can upload your own PDF form and 100% customize it to meet your specific business needs.

In addition to using free Work Assigner version you can get unlimited number of form submissions and remove all ads in the app by subscribing via an optional In-App Purchase. Subscribe from your device and access these services via mobile app.

If you have any questions, contact us at support@snappii.com
You can request a customization of the app so that it works better for you at https://www.snappii.com/request-a-custom-app
By downloading, you agree to the Terms of Use at https://www.snappii.com/policy

In-App Subscription Details:
• Monthly Unlimited Form Submission Subscription to get is $19.99 US dollars per month
• Annual Unlimited Form Submission Subscription to get is $199.99 US dollars per year
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
• Account will be charged for renewal automatically

title: Great Work
description:
The Great Work app from O.C. Tanner makes recognizing great work easy. Whether you’re celebrating small victories or team triumphs, having the ability to send recognition at your fingertips is an essential part of a thriving workplace culture.

Send recognition
Approve nominations
Shop for awards
Impact culture

To get started, simply sync the app to your O.C. Tanner recognition program. Your unique configurations will sync, too, so sending recognition with the app is just as quick and easy as it is online. The Great Work app is a fun, simple, secure way to recognize great work and the people who do it.

title: Shiftgig
description:
IMPORTANT INFORMATION: If you are a worker interested in using the Shiftgig app you MUST be an employee of a staffing agency that is Powered by Shiftgig. To see some of the agencies that are using the Shiftgig app, visit www.shiftgig.com/apply. You will NOT be able to log in without being employed by one of our staffing agency partners. You CAN NOT apply directly from the app.

Are you looking for an easy, flexible way to find work? We have staffing agency partners that are Powered by Shiftgig in your local area! Find shifts that fit your schedule at restaurants, convention centers, sporting events, banquets, hotels, schools, warehouses, and more! 

With Shiftgig’s app, staffing agencies put the power in your hands! Browse and claim shifts that fit your schedule and drop them if something comes up. In the app, you get clear visibility into what to expect at your shift to help you be successful, including your estimated pay, pay rate, and other important shift details. See a shift that you want to claim but it’s already full? Add yourself to the waitlist to be the first to find out if that shift is dropped. Finally, give feedback on your shift so our smart match algorithm can make suggestions based on the type of shifts you like.

Let’s transform the way people work...together.

These are some of the industry-leading agencies are using Shiftgig to offer on-demand gigs:
- LGC Hospitality
- Headway Workforce Solutions 
- EZgig
- BoltGigs
- The Job Center
- Customer Driven Staffing
- Driver on Demand

comments: I like the Shifting App!!! It's very convenient and let you know how much $$$ you will be receiving, how long you have to work, the proper attirement to wear and you can prepare yourself ahead of time in order to get to your destination in time for work.

The temp agency that I work for uses this app and it makes it so much easier, I think, for me as a worker to have right in front of me a calendar populated with all available jobs when scheduling for the week. It enables you to set up the schedule that best fits your availability and at the place of your choice if there is more than one option. I also love that the app allows feedback between employee and employer after submitting your hours worked that day.

Love having this kind of work as an option. Geo location is very specific and doesnt always make sense. Push Notifications tend to be pretty late so just keep checking app for work. Be careful to give extra time to get to catering gigs they may be hard to find on site and have yet to call on site contact and speak with anyone yet.

Very informative! With our company it allows you to check a description of the job. Then if, you are willing to and want to be reminded, we receive notifications.Then, we are consistently informed about new jobs every time they are posted as it appears in a notification. I find it very helpful and very easy to use.
Such a womderful app. So organized and efficient. Love it. ☺

description:
Finding construction jobs has never been easier with Faber. Connect with thousands of construction firms who believe creating world class projects require remarkable talent. Let Faber connect you with great companies, manage your schedule, and receive your payments so you can focus on your craft.

WORKER BENEFITS

Fair wages

We provide the most competitive wages in the industry. 

Getting paid

View how much you have made at anytime. You’ll be paid directly to your bank account every week. 

Flexible work schedule

Work & make money based on your schedule. Work whenever you want with your availability & location.

Rating & review

comments: BEWARE! I decided to delete my account and do something else. I did a search using their Help /Support option. There was no answer to my question "how to delete my account." So, they collect ALL your personal information (full name, DOB, home address, SSN, bank account#, email address, photo of you, your bio, personal reference and all their information, and etc) and offer you no way out?! Who are these people behind these apps? A Cult? Spies? Hackers? Paid by Gov. to collect and hold OUR info?
I really like the way the app is set up it's easy to use and very straightforward there's always jobs and the support staff are very professional and friendly.

Very easy to sign up and find work on. Support team replied quickly and is friendly. It's really useful for those who need to find work quickly. (I used the app for about 1 month while looking for work in my trade)

I really appreciate that I can just go on an App instead of heading to a temp Agency super early in the mornings where I would sometimes end up waiting there for hours hoping a job will become available for that day, and if your lucky to get a job longer than a day or two, then having to repeat the next day of hoping to get work. When with Faber App, I can simply check real quick (even on busy days I can check it and apply real quick) which is so much faster and more simple than other places :)

The company and app are great. I get at least 1 job offer per day, but so far none of them are related to my trade. Plus the pay for most of the jobs are low. You can make more money if you accept various jobs and accumulate points. Great support team and very responsive.

title: myShiftWork: Shift Work Calendar, Plan & Schedule
description:
myShiftWork is a simple, no-fuss shift work calendar to help schedule, plan & 
manage your shifts on your phone. 

Traditional calendar apps aren’t ideal for shift workers – myShiftWork solves the problem by letting you create custom work shifts with customizable icons & colors, then add them to your calendar with one tap. 

Add unlimited shifts per day or set up a shift rotation and apply it to your shift work calendar quickly & easily. Doing this makes it easy to set up an entire month’s – or more - worth of work shifts in less than a minute and you can see upcoming work shifts on your lock screen! 

View your work shifts in a simple, cleanly designed month view calendar or in a handy list format. 

You can overlay your personal calendar on top so you can keep track of what’s going on outside of work, too. 

With just a tap you can share your schedule with friends, family, and co-workers – whether they’re using myShiftWork or not. 

------------------------------------------------------------------
WHY SHIFT WORKERS LOVE MYSHIFTWORK
------------------------------------------------------------------
✔ CREATE SHIFTS

Add as many shifts as you’d like, and choose your own icon and header for each shift type.

✔ ADD TO CALENDAR WITH ONE TAP

Select one of your shifts, then tap each day on the work calendar you’d like to add it to. Unlimited shifts per day.

✔ SHARE YOUR SCHEDULE

Send friends, family, and co-workers your work schedule whether they’re using myShiftWork or not.

✔ UPCOMING SHIFT WORK WIDGET

See your work shift schedule without even opening up the app, right from the lock screen, or from inside any other app.

✔ SET UP CUSTOM SHIFT ROTATIONS

Set up shift rotations and myShiftWork will automatically apply your shifts over any date range you choose – great for repeating schedules (e.g. a 3-week schedule that repeats for 4 months).


---------------------------------------------
MORE AWESOME FEATURES
---------------------------------------------

• Add personalized notes to any of your shifts
• Enter your hourly rate and we’ll show you an estimate of your monthly earnings 
• Add unlimited shifts per day (Pro. Version Only)
• Reminders for shifts
• Indicate vacation days with the holiday icon, or sick days with the medical icon 
• See your schedule on the Calendar or List view
• Swipe between months, or pick any month (just tap the date at the top)

--------------------------
PERFECT FOR…
-------------------------- 
• Nurses
• Emergency workers 
• Doctors
• Security guards 
• Cleaners
• Retail employees 
• Laborers
• Servers, bartenders, kitchen staff 
• Grocers
• Police and Firefighters 
• Military
• Surgeons
• News and media reporters 
• Paramedics
• Students and part-time workers 
• Taxi or Uber drivers
• Shipping and warehouse staff 
• Pest control workers
• Locksmiths
• Hydro workers
• Protective service 
• Food preparations
• Truckers and tow-truck drivers 
• Construction workers
• Bus drivers and other transportation workers
• Air Crew 
• Pilots
• Anyone who wants a shift work calendar & has trouble keeping track of their shift schedule! 


With myShiftWork, you’ll be able to glance at your shift calendar and immediately know when you’re working – and when you’re not.


If you have any concerns, issues or suggestions about how we can improve the app please email support@myshiftworkapp.com

DOWNLOAD MYSHIFTWORKER TODAY – THE SIMPLE, EASY TO USE SHIFT WORK 
CALENDAR, PLAN & SCHEDULE!
